Enjoy your holiday in pristine white sand at the seashore, before you prepare to end this tour of Dubai and the Maldives

Meditation Teacher Training is a course that is introduced by the yoga essence ashram. Yoga essence ashram is a very famous ashram for meditation and yoga. Meditation means not only just closing your eyes and sitting alone, meditation is more than that there are lots of meditation techniques that you learn in yoga essence. In this meditation teacher training course, you learn the basic foundations of meditation practices and 20+ meditation & mindfulness techniques. In this course, you will also learn the science behind all meditation practices. It is a total transformational and intensive meditation practice.

Kundalini Yoga Teacher Training is a course in which you will learn the intense practice of kundalini energy awaking. Kundalini shakti is that energy that is found under the base of the spine. In this course, you get the clarity and deep knowledge of the core principles of meditation & mindfulness. You also feel the power of silence and How silence is important for your kundalini awakening. When you kundalini shakti awakening your other chakra will also have a chance of awakening but for that, you need lots of yogic and meditation practice.

Hatha Yoga Teacher Training course is certified by Yoga Alliance USA. In our Hatha Yoga Teacher Training course, you will also learn 100 hours of Yoga Nidra. In the Hatha Yoga Teacher Training course, you will learn different yoga asana and breathing techniques. In this course, you will learn the depth of yoga asana and the science behind every asana. In this course you will not learn yoga asana but also know the path of spirituality and consciousness growth.

Transformation yoga teacher training is a course in which you will learn the high experiential and transformational value of yoga, this is the perfect course for those students who are looking for profound changes in their life. Yoga essence ashram is the well-named ashram of Yoga and meditation in Rishikesh in the foothills of the Himalayas near the river Ganga. It is a very peaceful palace to start your inner journey and learn a new concept of yogic science, Ayurveda, and meditation. When you come to this ashram you will feel very positive energy here.

The 200-hour Yoga Teacher training course is that course where we cover all the dimensions related to yoga, breathing, and asana. Breathing is a very important part of yoga breathing is not about inhaling or exhaling but it is about the time in which you have to hold and exhale, every asana has its breathing way in this 200-hour yoga teacher training course we learn all these techniques with yoga posture and practice. This course is suitable for the beginner because it starts from the basic to the advanced level. In this course, you will learn every aspect of yoga and this course is also certified by yoga alliance USA.

eventname: Himalaya Abenteuer Pilgerreise, Badrinath & Kedarnath, mit Nirmala & Gunnar: 9.-28.10.2022
description:
9.-28.10.2022
Seit Urzeiten ziehen sich die Yogis in diese Himalaya-Region zurück, um Meditation und Yoga zu üben. Die überwältigende Landschaft ist voll von mystischen Kraftorten und antiken Tempeln.

Ziel dieser Himalaya-Reise sind Tempel und Berggipfel im Quellgebiet des Ganges oberhalb von Rishikesh. Begib Dich mit dem erfahrenen Reiseleiter und Yogalehrer Narada auf Entdeckungsreise durch „Dev-Bhumi“, das „Land der Götter“!

Lass Dich auf dieser Pilgerreise von den heiligen Orten und der beeindruckenden Natur des Himalaya inspirieren.

Erfülle Dein Herz mit inneren Bildern, die Dich Dein Leben lang begleiten werden!

Nimm Teil an einer abenteuerliche Reise mit kleiner Gruppe durch den Himalaya zu mystischen Orten, welche für den Hinduismus und das Yoga von großer Bedeutung sind.

Bei der Himalaya-Reise mit Narada fahren wir mit kleinen Fahrzeugen durch die Berge und Täler des Himalaya und besuchen dort mythologisch bedeutsame Orte. Vor Ort wird es viel Zeit für Meditationen bei den Tempeln geben und Vorträge über Geschichte und Bedeutung der einzelnen aufgesuchten Orte.

Im Quellgebiet des Ganges gibt es sehr viele Orte, die für Yoga und den Hinduismus von großer Bedeutung sind. Die Himalaya-Abenteuer-Pilgerreise konzentriert sich auf den Bereich der Gebirgsflüsse Alakananda und Mandakini, da dort die größte Dichte an heiligen Orten ist.

https://purnam.de/reise/pilgerreise-himalaya/

eventname: Rajgad to Raigad range trek via Boratyachi Naal
description:
Experience a three-day thrilling range trek covering the three prestigious forts in the history of the Hindawi Swarajya: Rajgad - Torna - Raigad forts.
  
Our trek starts from Pali village for Padmavati machi at Rajgad fort, then towards Torna fort from Sanjivani machi with a lunch break. Descending through Valanjai Darwaja towards Bhatti village, we will travel by vehicle to Mohiri village and rest for the day. The next day we start our descent through Boratyachi naal towards Pane village, Lunch en route, and proceed towards Pachad village for the rest of the day. Early in the morning, we will resume our trek to the Raigad fort to pay tribute to the Shivaji Maharaj. 


Rajgad, the royal fort of Maharashtra was the first capital of the Hindawi swarajya during the rule of Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj for almost 26 years, after which he moved the capital to Raigad Fort. The diameter of the fort at the base is 40 km making it difficult for anybody to lay siege to it, adding to its strategic value. 

Highest Elevation: 1374 Metres, Grade: Moderate.


Torna is one of the highest hill forts in Maharashtra & moderately tough to climb. Shri Chatrapati Shivaji Maharaj conquered it in 1643 at the age of 16 and renamed it as Prachandagad which translates to the ‘Massive Fort’ 

Highest Elevation: 1405 Metres, Grade: Moderate

Raigad, the next capital after Rajgad, represents the strength of Hindavi swarajya. The fort was considered safe as it is surrounded by high mountains and rivers.  One can see both Rajgad and Torna fort from Raigad.

Highest elevation: 1356 Metres, Grade: Easy-Moderate  


Trek Stats
Grade: Moderate, Endurance: High, Total trek distance: 50KM approx.

Highlights:
Historical forts of Maratha kingdom.
Rajgad to Torna trail.
The trail from Rajgad to Raigad via Boratyachi naal.
Camping in tents at Mohiri, base village of Lingana.
Traditional Maharashtrian local cuisine. 


Itinerary:

DAY 0:

• Private vehicle journey from Dadar East at 11:00 PM with pickup points at Chembur, Vashi, Panvel, and Pune ( exact locations will be shared with the registered participants).

DAY1:

• Reach base village (Pali) - 05:30 AM.

• Fresh up & Breakfast - 45 min.

• Event briefing - 15 minutes.

• Ascend trek to Padmavati machi at Rajgad - 2 hours approx.

• Short break – 30 min.

• Descend from Sanjivani machi towards Torna fort base. 4 hours approx 

• Lunch break – 1 hour.

• Ascend to Torna 2 hours approx.

• Short break - 1 hour.

• Descend towards Bhatti village – 2 hours approx.

• Bhatti village to Mohiri village by arranged vehicle – 30 min approx.

• Dinner break - 1 hour. 

•  Rest in tents at Bhatti village

DAY 2:

• Wake up call - 5:30 a.m.

• Fresh up & breakfast - 1 hour.

• descent trek from Boratyachi Naal to Pane village– 6 hours approx.

• Lunch break – 2 hours.

• Trek towards Raigad base - 2 hours approx.

• Rest for the day at Pachad village.

DAY 3:

• Wake-up call - 5:30 a.m.

• Fresh up & breakfast - 1 hour.

• Ascend Raigad fort- 2 hours approx.

• explore Raigad fort- 2 hours approx.

• Descend Raigad fort- 2 hours approx.

• Ascend & explore Raigad fort- 4 hours approx.

• Lunch Break - 1 hour.

• Return journey to Pune/ Mumbai



Expenses:
₹3500 per head, Inclusive of transport from Mumbai by hired NON-AC vehicle; Breakfast, Veg Lunch, Veg dinner, tent stay on DAY1; Breakfast, Veg Lunch, Veg dinner, tent stay/ Dorm stay on DAY2; Breakfast, Veg Lunch on Day 3.

3200 per head from Pune, inclusive of all Travel, food, and stay expenses.

Excluded: snacks/ lunch break during travel, Cool drinks, or any personal expenses.

How to Register

Step-2: Fill up the Mandatory participation disclaimer form which will be sent after payment confirmation and select the preferable pickup location.
Step -3: We will create a WhatsApp group of the registered participants in the evening on the day of the event departure for coordination. 

Checklist

Full sleeve synthetic/ polyester t-shirt/ shirt.

Things to Carry:
Carry a single rucksack with the following things:

eventname: WSR Monsoon Trek to Peb (Vikatgad) Fort on 25th June 2022
description:
Short Info:

Type: Hill Fort

Height: 2100 Feet above MSL (Approx)

Grade: Medium

District: Raigad

Region: Karjat

Base Village: Neral

Cost: 650/- Per Person

            600/- WSR Members

Trek Lead: Adithya/ Mayur

 

About:

Located in the same mountain range as Matheran, Peb fort is an enjoyable trek for a day’s outing.

The fort derives its name from the Goddess 'Pebi'; Peb is also called 'Vikatgad' for its supposed shape of the Elephant Headed God, 'Ganesh'. The trek to the top involves surmounting a small rock patch and a ladder.

The fort is famous for its caves which are maintained by disciples of Swami Samartha and the meditation chambers carved out from the rock inside the mountain. To get inside the meditation chamber, one has to crawl through a narrow passage in the rock and then climb down into the meditation chamber. The chamber is very well maintained with tiles on the floor for ppl to sit and meditate.

The fort also has a temple dedicated to Swami Samartha on the top and has the footwear or 'Padukas' worn by the great saint kept on the top. The view of the entire Neral and Karjat region from the top is worth the climb. Another attraction of the trek is the only standing Bastion or Buruj facing the Panorama point of Matheran, the view from here is just too beautiful to describe.

 

Itinerary:

We will be starting with the CST - Karjat Fast Local (Time table given below)

People may board the same Karjat train from the station of their convenience and meet us in the train directly. (Get into second boggy from CST side)

07:49 am, Neral

Breakfast at Neral

Reach Vikatgad Fort by 12:30 pm

Have Lunch @ Vikatgad Fort.

Leave for Matheran by 2 pm

Reach Matheran by 5 pm and proceed towards Dasturi Naka.

Take Taxi till Neral Station

Reach Neral Station by 6 pm.

Evening Refreshment at Neral.

Catch the train from Neral.

Reach Dadar by 9.30 pm - 10 pm

Members are requested to take return ticket till Neral by their own.

Board the second last compartment which is the second one from CST side. Everybody will board the same local and we meet in the train itself

eventname: Ayurveda Massage Course in Goa, India (4-weeks ayurveda course)
description:
Kerala Ayurveda Massage Course Training, Goa, INDIA

Aithein Ayurveda School / College conduct Ayurveda Massage Course Training Programs in Goa, India (authentic professional Kerala Ayurveda Massage Training course).
Our Ayurveda Massage Training courses are prepared by highly qualified and experienced professionals in the field of Traditional Ayurveda in Kerala, India.

We have enough theoretical classes and practical time to allow the participants to understand the Traditional Ayurveda massage therapies of Kerala.

Ayurveda massage course trainings are for those who are interested in deep knowledge and practical training in Ayurveda Panchakarma therapies, massage & treatment practices of Kerala. The Kerala Ayurveda massage training course includes the study of traditional Ayurveda treatments.

Aithein’s Kerala Ayurveda Massage Training course and Aithein Ayurveda Massage School (India) is recognized for Ayurveda Massage Training Course by “Government of India” for conducting Ayurveda Panchakarma Training course (Ayurveda Massage Training Course) in GOA (India).

Aithein Ayurveda Massage School (India) provides authentic kerala ayurveda education in a safe and conducive and extremely supportive environment. Ayurveda is the ancient science of life. We encourage the integration of Ayurveda by individuals into their daily living.

Franchise India 2022 - The 18th International Franchise and Retail Show is back with a bang! This is the only platform in India that facilitates the buying and selling of franchise businesses for both global as well as domestic brands. This platform gives us a chance to commemorate the spirit of saanjhedari that has been the basis of Indian business community and the same spirit that breathes life into a franchisee-franchisor's bonding for a continual and mutually rewarding growth of business. Franchise India 2022 comes back with the same platform for brands to meet prospective franchise buyers and find new homes for their brand at diverse geographies. As for the franchisors, the aspiring entrepreneurs also get a chance to meet and interact with different brands and make informed decision about buying a franchise.

India, the golden bird of the world has never been so alluring for both global and domestic brands. With the implementation of GST and FDI been approved for single brand outlets, the fresh crop of B School grads opting for start-ups and a new breed of incubators as well as investors showing interest in boosting businesses across the board and geographies, business world is buzzing with fresh ideas and resources.

The exhibition will have brands putting up their stalls under different pavilions namely, Franchise Pavilion, Low Cost Pavilion, Brand Licensing Pavilion, Estate World, Entrepreneur India, Incubator Program, International Pavilion, Loan Center Pavilion among others.

Investors and budding entrepreneurs, Block your dates now!

Registration to put up your stall is open.

eventname: Diploma in Photography with Specialization in Nature & Wildlife
description:
Course Details :
The 6 month course is to develop and nurture the basic and advanced understanding of photography to the enrolled participants, how a photograph is made rather than just a click. The course will open and broaden one's mind to the world of photography and make you a super Specialist in Nature and Wildlife . And to see the world in a different perspective. The course is mainly focused on Fundamentals of Photography with reference to Nature and Wildlife . 

The course is developed in DPC with the experience of last 11 years in the field of photography, after meeting and talking with lots of professional, amateurs photographers and people from different walks of life and conducting more than 250 workshops, 400 photowalks, 100+ photo bus trips, 35+ photo exhibitions and many tea talks with senior Photographers and Industry leaders. 

The 6 month weekday course is seeking participants who want to take photography as their profession . The minimum qualification for this course is 12+ PASS or equivalent course. Workshop is 2 classes every week of 3 hours each. 

Duration : 6 Months

eventname: TUFFMAN SHIMLA ULTRA - HALF MARATHON MASHOBRA (6TH EDITION) 2022
description:
HOLLLLAAA !!!!

Tuffman is super stoked to announce again the 6th Edition of Tuffman Shimla Ultra & Half Marathon Mashobra on 25th June, 2022 at Mashobra Greens.

It will be a LIMITED & LIVE Event. ⚠️

REGISTRATION & EVENT DETAILS

Event Name : Tuffman Shimla Ultra & Half Marathon Mashobra (6th Edition)

Date : Saturday, 25th June, 2022

Race Distances : 80K | 50K | 30K | 21K | 10K | TuffKids 4K

REGISTRATIONS END on 25th May, 2022

Write to us at info@tuffmanindia.com for group & corporate discounts (5+ participants), general & sponsorship queries.


QUALIFICATION & AGE ELIGIBILITY CRITERIA FOR EACH RACE

For 80K - You must have completed a minimum of a marathon under 4:45 hrs or any 50K in last 2 years.
For 50K - You must have completed a minimum of a 21K in last 2 years.

There is no qualification criteria for distances as 30K | 21K | 10K | TuffKid 4K.

AGE ELIGIBILITY CRITERIA FOR EACH RACE
 
⭕ For 21K & beyond distances - All athletes must be 18 or older on race day. 

⭕ For 10K - All people must be 14 years or older on the race day.

⭕ For TuffKids 4K - All children must be 8 years or older on the race day.

RACE REGISTRATION LINK

https://www.citywoofer.com/e/tuffman-shimla-ultra-half-marathon-mashobra-2022

RACE CATEGORIES


Race – Start Time – Cut Off Timings

⭕ 80K – Starts at 05:30 hrs

Total time with distance cutoff applicable for 80K - 13:00 hrs (13:30 hrs)* 

1st 40K – 06:00 hrs (06:30 hrs)* 

2nd 40K – 07:00 hrs (07:00 hrs)*

Net Cutoff for 80K - 13:00 hrs (13:30 hrs)*

⭕ 50K – 06:30 hrs – 08:00 hrs (08:30 hrs)*

⭕ 30K – 07:30 hrs – 05:00 hrs (05:15 hrs)*  

⭕ 21K – 08:00 hrs – 04:00 hrs

⭕ 10K – 08:00 hrs – 02:30 hrs

⭕ TuffKids 4K (Timed) – 14:00 hrs – 01:30 hrs (For kids, aged between 10 - 18 years & moms & senior citizens) 

*Timings indicated with an asterisk are the timings which are allowed to a veteran category runner.


EVENT HASHTAGS

#TuffmanShimla #ShimlaUltra #ShimlaUltraMashobra #HillRun #FitIndia

#MashobraGreens #Mashobra #Pixstory #smartDataEnterprises

#Bodyvine #WowSkinScience #RunningInShimla #ShimlaRuns #ShimlaRunning

#TuffmanShimlaUltraAndHalfMarathonMashobra

#Tuffman #BeATuffman #TuffKids #ITRACertifiedRace


RACE COURSE & AID STATIONS


Tuffman Shimla Ultra & Half Marathon Mashobra is one of the toughest run courses in India.

The race starts & finishes at Mashobra Greens, Mashobra, Near to Shimla, Himachal Pradesh for all the race categories.


⭕ 80K – Loop of 40K with approx elevation gain - 4950 mtrs.  

⭕ 50K – Loop of 40K and U Turn 5K with approx elevation gain - 2960 mtrs.  

⭕ 30K – Going till 15K and turn back on the same route with elevation gain - 2550 mtrs.

⭕ 21K – Going till 10.5K and turn back on the same route with approx elevation gain -  1250 mtrs.  

⭕ 10K – Going till 5K and turn back on the same route with approx elevation gain - 950 mtrs.

⭕ TuffKids 4K – Loop of 2K and turn back on the same route with approx elevation gain - 600 mtrs. 

It will be again a very top-notch and challenging ultra experience for all the runners as its of the most toughest hill ultra runs in India as claimed by people.


This ultra trail will cover all the exquisite views of the dense woods at Mashobra, Shimla and will provide you a rejuvenating and revamping experience all together.

The race route is hilly (with great elevation) and will keep you ever enthusiastic as the race route is full of pine trees, scenic views at an expanse, local villages, rolling hills with amazing vegetation and will provide you either a rewarding OR a cursing (only if you didn't train well) but always zealous escapade all together.


The race loop is 40 kms (20 kms out & 20 kms back) which will be on 80% Tar Road & 20% Trail with great rolling hills elevation, almost traffic free country roads which will be perfectly cherished by you.
 

Adequate aid stations will be there at every 5K with Medical & Physiotherapy Support at the start point will be put up in the race as they shall be enough to keep you well hydrated, energyful & recovered all the way to and fro in the hilly run.

Local Villagers — Country people can be seen either walking to their workplaces, chilling outside their houses with sudden change of temperatures in sections of the race played by the sun & shade & #TeamTuffman waiting to receive you at the aid stations.


RACE EXPO & BRIEFING

On 24th June, 2022 i.e, Friday at 13:30 hrs – 17:00 hrs at Mashobra Greens (Our Hospitality Partner) – Participants can collect their bib along with the goodie bags there at the race expo and 17:00 hrs onwards we’ll talk about the race course, rules and regulations, conditions and a Q/A session which would be followed by carb loading.


RACE INCLUSIONS FOR 80K / 50K Runners are entitled to have an Excellent Quality Personalized Tuffman DRI - FIT T-Shirt, Tuffman Ultra Cap, Premium Race Goodie Bag, Timing Bib, Pre Run Carb Loading, Pre - During - Post Race Hydration, Medical & Physiotherapy Support during the race, Finisher's Medal, Post Race Booze, Hot Meal After Race, Your Excellent Pictures throughout the race, Digital Timed Race Certificate (for all finishers - post completion of the race), Bib Wise Race Photos Search, Promised Good Memories.

RACE INCLUSIONS FOR 30K / 21K / 10K / TuffKids 4K Runners are entitled to have an Excellent Quality Tuffman DRI - FIT T-Shirt, Race Goodie Bag, Timing Bib, Pre Run Carb Loading, Pre - During - Post Race Hydration, Medical & Physiotherapy Support during the race, Finisher's Medal, Post Race Booze (Not for 4K Participants), Hot Meal After Race, Your Excellent Pictures throughout the race, Digital Timed Race Certificate (for all finishers - post completion of the race), Bib Wise Race Photos Search, Promised Good Memories.

 

GRATIFICATIONS FOR PODIUM FINISHERS
Tuffman Trophies to First 3 Podium Finishers shall be awarded to Both Men & Women, from each run category, (if applicable).

BAGGAGE COUNTER FOR ALL

Bags will be kept safe at the baggage counter at START / FINISH area. Valuables like mobile, wallet, cash, valuable metals, MP3 players, etc. are not to be kept inside the bag.

Light Convenience Bags can be handed over to the team with runner's name tag attached on it at the baggage counter on the race day. The bags will be available at start / finish point near the 0K Aid Station. (Any kind of valuables not to be kept inside the submitted bag, under any circumstances).

Bags kept anywhere outside the designated area - would not be administered by us. Baggage will be completely kept at owner's risk & any kind of theft claims won't be entertained.


BAG DROP (Only for 50K & 80K Runners)
Convenience Bags can be handed over to our team at the end of race briefing with runner's name tag attached on it which will be supplied in the goodie bag.
 

ACCOMMODATION FACILITY AT MASHOBRA GREENS

For your convenience, we would simply suggest that staying at Mashobra Greens will be more comfy as the race starts from Mashobra Greens only & is well equipped for a hospitable stay for your family and friends.


ACCOMMODATION OPTIONS FOR YOUR COMFORTABLE STAY

⭕ Bamboo Cottages with Attached Washroom
⭕ Luxury Mud Cottages with Attached Washroom
 

Nice jungle walks, obstacles around base camp, adventure activities offered by our hospitality partner for your family and friends. Delicious food amidst of jungle, soothing tunes and bonfire ... all will be there at Mashobra Greens.

Accommodation at the best possible rates is available at Mashobra Greens as per the above stated options which are provided to everyone for 2 days on suitable sharing basis (TWIN / TRIPLE) which includes all meals for 2 days i.e Breakfast, Lunch & Dinner. You can contact us at info@tuffmanindia.com.

FEATURE CREATIVES FOR THE RACE

Pictures requested in the registration process are for feature creatives and are only for promotional purposes only.

The feature creatives will only be made for registered participants up till 20th May, 2022.

No feature creative shall be made for anyone after the above mentioned date.

The same are NOT anyway a part of the race inclusions for your registration.


SEE YOU AT THE MASHOBRA GREENS !!


QUESTIONS???
Get them answered here.
Tuffman
Tuffman Shimla Ultra & Half Marathon Mashobra 2022
info@tuffmanindia.com

Amdavadi let’s be a part of the best running experience in this monsoon season Neon Night Fun Run . 

An initiative by Decathlon C.G Road and event managed by JS Sports Events.

The event is open to all to extend our belief in SPORTS FOR ALL/ ALL FOR SPORTS. Brave the Amdavad Neon Night Fun Run and reach the finish line.


About Decathlon

Decathlon is a global brand with global goals. Sustainability and awareness is a global agenda at the moment and protecting the environment is the responsibility of every individual. Which is why at decathlon have decided to engage community in an eco-friendly manner hoping to build on the work we are already doing in the background (MIA Recycled materials etc ). 

As a local initiative we want all our users not just the fitness enthusiasts but also the average joe to come and be a part of our run to save the planet. we will be showcasing sustainable living programs during the event and will also be highlighting the need for a drastic change in all our daily activities. 

Running is one of the best ways to improve your lifestyle and also cut back on the carbon footprint. running/jogging/walking are safe and healthy alternatives to combustion-oriented travel and if every individual tries to incorporate them into their regular routine we will be making a huge impact when it comes to saving the environment. Not to mention the overall health benefits of running outdoors cannot be underestimated. 

Green psychology has a direct influence on our happiness running releases endorphins that trigger a happy response within and countless other physiological benefits that can only be achieved through cardio activity. 

We would like to share our belief with every citizen of Amdavad Lets make Running accessible to the many.



What are you waiting for?

Register Now

#WinYourGame

Event Details:

Date: 26 June l Sunday l 7:30 PM To 10:30 PM
Event Venue: Vallabhsadan Ashram Road Riverfront Ahmedabad
Category: 10Kms (Timed Event) & 5Kms Fun Run


Eligibility Criteria

10Kms (Timed Run): Only for 14 years and above
5Kms: Only for 8 years and above


Runner Amenities

Official Race T-Shirt 
An official race BIB (RFID Tagged) for 10Kms Run
Water energy drinks and refreshments along the course. 
Medical Support. Post-race refreshments Finisher’s medal
Timing SMS & Timing Certificate (Soft Copy) for 10Kms Run


> On Race Day a victory ceremony will be conducted for the fastest 10Kms winners for men & women.

Podium finishers will get 5k, 3.5k & 2k gift cards, for both categories (Male and women) Winners



> Fastest 5Kms Categories winners of men & Women.

Podium finishers will get Decathlon goodies, for both (Male & women) categories


Rules & Regulations

Participants are required to wear a mask and ensure COVID-appropriate behavior at all times inside the venue.
Participants must register on or before the closing date of the registration no new entry will be accepted post 20 June 2022. 
Once registration is confirmed the fee is non-refundable IF THE EVENT IS CANCELLED DUE TO ANY UNFORESEEN CIRCUMSTANCES BEYOND THE CONTROL OF THE ORGANIZERS THE REGISTRATION FEE PAID BY YOU FOR PARTICIPATION WILL BE ADJUSTED TOWARDS YOUR PARTICIPATION ON A NEW DATE. IN THE EVENT OF YOU BEING UNABLE TO PARTICIPATE ON THE NEW DATE YOU WILL NOT BE ELIGIBLE FOR A REFUND.
Please save the confirmation email received after registration as a reference for future communications.
Runners found to have interchanged their running number bib and/or timing bib tag with another individual will be disqualified from the event and shall not be allowed to apply or participate in the subsequent edition of the event.
Please note if you don't wear your timing bib tag as instructed you won't be able to get an official finish time and thereby the official Certificate recording your finish times. No bib tag – No Timing – No Prize.
No vehicles are allowed on the course. Anyone bringing wheeled vehicles will be disqualified from the race; you will be asked to leave the course. 
Only those confirmed participants wearing the running number bibs will be allowed on the route. Any person found wearing the incorrect bib or no bib will be disqualified and removed by the course security.
Further every runner must wear his/her running number bib on the front of the vest. Any mutilation fold alteration or damage to the bib will amount to disqualification of the runner from the event.
Organizers reserve the right to stop any participant from participating who is found medically unfit to continue in the opinion of the medical personnel.
Baggage counters are available for all participants. It is strongly recommended that you do not leave valuables like mobile phone camera jewellery watch electronic gadgets etc. in the bag stored. Organizers are not responsible for any loss of baggage and/or its belongings
Participants are requested to cooperate with the police and security personnel deputed at the event venue and on route. Participants/supporters are liable to random checking on race day – this is for your own security.
Entry Cancellation: Requests for cancellation & transfer will not be accepted and thereby refund will not be entertained.
The right to participate in the event and the rights and benefits available to the applicant under this application form is at the sole discretion of the Event Organizing team and cannot be transferred to any other person under any circumstances and the applicant alone shall be entitled to the rights and benefits arising hereunder.
Rules listed are subject to change as per the discretion of the Event Heads and the Organizing Committee. 
Please bear in mind that all events venues and timings are subject to change.

eventname: TOUR in INDIA 2022 & Teacher Training 100 ore
description:
Yoga Isvara Studio a Bologna è felice di proporre questo evento 

TEACHER TRAINING e TOUR in INDIA 2022

21 GIORNI dal 11 al 31 Ottobre, 2022

New Delhi  - Mysore - Rishikesh - Vrindavan - Taj Mahal

100hrs Yoga Alliance. 

Aperto a tutti i livelli di pratica

Professori del corso: 
Chaitanya Nitai Das 
Syam Vallabhi DD

Assistenti: 
Yogindra Bhagavan Das (Daniele)
Tulsi Krpa DD (Teresa). 


Unisciti a noi in un viaggio indimenticabile, per costruire relazioni e ricordi che ti ispireranno nella tua pratica dello yoga per tutta la vita! 


ITINERARIO:

Ott. 11 - Arrivo all'aeroporto di Nuova Delhi, check in Hotel a partire dalle ore 13:00 (1 ora di distanza dall'aeroporto) *Non arrivare oltre le ore 20:00 in hotel*
Ott. 12 - Colazione e orientamento. Tour dei più importanti templi e mercatini di Delhi.
Ott. 13 - Partenza mattutina in aereo per Bangalore (2 ore).
Ott. 14 e 15 - Conosceremo l'India meridionale e studieremo e praticheremo il Iyengar Yoga e visitermo Bangalore nei suoi luoghi sacri. 
Ott. 16 e 17 - Tour di Mysore, il luogo di nascita dell'Ashtanga Vinyasa Yoga e dove è nata la prima scuola di Krishnamacharya. Studieremo e praticheremo l'Ashtanga Vinyasa Yoga così come nella sua versione originale. 
Ott. 18 - Ritorno a Nuova Delhi in aereo, pernottamento a Nuova Delhi.
Ott. 19 - viaggio via terra verso Rishikesh. la capitale dello Yoga. 
Ott. 20-25: Ritiro Yogico a Rishikesh. Tour dei luoghi sacri; terapie ayurvediche, visita delle grotte degli antichi yogi ai piedi dell'Himalaya e bagno nelle cascate e nel fiume Gange. Yoga e meditazione sulle bianche spiagge del fiume Gange. Visita ai templi di Rishikesh nel pomeriggio. 
Ott. 26 - Pratica yoga e meditazione al mattino, nel pomeriggio ci dirigeremo a Haridwar, le porte dell'Himalaya, per vedere la cerimonia (puja) del fiume Gange. 
Ott. 27 - viaggio in treno per Vrindavan (6 ore). 
Ott. 28-30: Pellegrinaggio ai luoghi santi, incontro con i maestri dell'INdia, Tramonto sul fiume Jamuna in barca, visita del Taj-Mahal. 
Ott. 31: Cerimonia e consegna dei diplomi. 
Il tour termina alle 10:00 (3 ore in taxi da Nuova Delhi).

Questa esperienza di 21 giorni si applica per 100 ore e si va a sommare alle tue cerficazioni di 200, 250 o 500 ore con Yoga Alliance International. 

*L'evento di facebook non permette di inserire la data reale di fine del viaggio e cioè 31 ottobre (in questo evento è impostato al 25 ottobre ma la data di fine è 31 ottobre 2022) 

E' possibile richiedere il programma completo, valore del corso e termini di partecipazione ai seguenti contatti :
-- 

Yoga Isvara Bologna 
Scuola Bhakti Vinyasa
Segreteria organizzativa:

Telefoni
338 8790126 (anche whatsapp)

e-mail: info@yogaisvara.it

Mahabaleshwar is a famous hill station of Maharashtra. With the onset of monsoon, it will be blessed with clouds and streams. We will cover three gigantic waterfalls and the famous Pratapgarh fort in this monsoon trip to Mahabaleshwar.
Join us to experience the jannat of monsoon.

Saturday
21:00 - Start travelling in a private bus from Andheri. Pickup en-route from JVLR, Mulund, Navi Mumbai. 
01:00 - Pickup from Pune. 

Sunday
05:00 - Reach Mahabaleshwar and rest for some time near Elphinstone Point
06:30 - As the twilight emerges we will see Dhobi waterfalls amidst pristine nature.
08:00 - After the delicious breakfast of Mahabaleshwar, we will proceed to see the Chinaman’s waterfall from Babbington point.
10:00 - We will now enter the zone of Lingmala. We can splash in the smaller cascade of Lingmala falls before the sightseeing of bigger cascade.
12:00 - The waterfall fun will make us super hungry for feasting into local delicacy
14:00 - Visit Pratapgad fort
15:00 - Start travelling back to Mumbai
22:00 - Reach Andheri

999/- per person (Without travel)

Any kind of cost which is not mentioned in the cost includes above.

Imagine:
Last night, First Day Camping beside a beautiful lake. Celebrating the last night’s first day far besides a lake with gazing stars up in the sky, cold breeze touching your cheeks, peace in mind, playing jokes around, singing around the bonfire, etc. Isn’t that wonderful! We call out to everyone who is looking for a unique way rather than hanging out at a disc or pub this New Year Eve. Best suited for groups, solo campers, couples, families, and pets.

Accommodation:
Tent pitched Beside the Lake itself.
Tents will have mattresses, Pillow and blanket.
The location has proper built bathroom and western washrooms. 

Itinerary:
04:00 PM:- Reach the campsite on your own.On Arrival Refreshment Juice. Our organizer team will provide you with 1-liter purifier water Freshen up and Have soulful snacks with Garma Garam Snacks with Tea/Coffee.
05:30 PM:- Icebreaker round. Settle down and enjoy the sundowner Music with Sun setting from the Lake Camp. The place is all-time best for nature photography. You may enjoy indoor games such as carrom, badminton, volleyball, or one can just relax and unwind on hammocks until sunset.
07:00 PM:- Its time to move and groove to the beats of Mumbai Best DJ Player & The Party Begins.
08:00 PM: Fill in your tummies with the hot starters rolling around.
10:00 PM:- Unlimited Delicious dinner (Veg/Non-veg/Jain) will be served prepared by locals with traditional Indian cooking style.
10:30 PM:- The Live Gig Gang will take charge to please you all with their soulful songs burning campfire with an awesome LIVE MUSIC BAND GROUP by the beach! And this experience will be locked forever accompanied by loads of fantastic memories!
02:00 AM: End the day nearby a beach under the open sky & Enjoy sleeping in Tent.(Foam mattress will be provided)

Day 201st Jan'22
09:00 AM:- Wake up around 7 am and enjoy the chillness of the air.
09:30 AM: Enjoy the pleasant morning along the Lakeside, play games, take a dip into the sea or one can go for the Boating activities.
10:00 AM: A hot cup of tea and tummy full breakfast with the sight of alleviating Lake is a just perfect weekend treat!!
11:00 AM: the saddest part would be leaving the campsite and the Lake behind. But we take back the memories created and captured.

Things To Carry:
Identity Proof (Compulsory)
Extra clothes- sun cap and a woolen cap UV protected sunglasses One set of extra clothes cotton long sleeves or 1 short sleeve t-shirt A small towel
Toiletries- toothpaste, toothbrush Paper soap, or sanitizer Sunscreen minimum of spf40 , lip balm, cold creams Body spray LED torch light
camera- Optional

Covid Guidelines:
Mask and maintaining social distance with others are mandatory throughout the trip.
Buses will be fully sanitized before the use.
Carrying your own sanitizers, gloves, face shield and mask is compulsory.
Food will be freshly cooked and packed as per WHO guidelines.

Whatsapp on 9096893351

description:
Youth, most relevant stake holders of the Republic of India are meeting for a Spiritual dialogue cum meditation retreat
based on a Parliamentary modus platform to showcase and recognize their views, voice and values towards the reestablishing of a Golden Bharat.
This Spiritual Youth Parliament will give wings to the creative thoughts and efforts of the youth for a new India. Interactive sharing will enhance & uplift their thinking skills to the next level. Come, join and enrich yourself with such rich experience. 

For participation contact the nearest Brahma Kumaris mediation center.

Objective:
1. To create spiritual awareness for an all-around development among youth.
2. To empower youth leaders of various fields for sustainable development. 
3. To illuminate the principle of Self-transformation towards World Transformation.
4. To harness youth power in solving national problems. 

Key Highlights & Activities:
1. Designed specifically to nurture through self-learning, participation, and individual expression.
2. Interactions with renowned Rajyoga Teachers of the Brahma Kumaris, Youth Icons, and Young Achievers.
3. Coalition building among youth beyond religious and geographical boundaries.
4. Cultural Evening; knowing & experiencing the best practices of
volunteerism


For any more information, please feel free to contact us



+91 6351302411
youthwing@bkivv.org

Wildlife Geeks & Nature enthusiast must be awar about engaging & the back to back sightings happening these days at the one of the Southern Woods of India: Kabini also known as land of leopards.

ClicknFrame hereby organising the very frequent & exciting learning wildlife photo tour plan to Paradise of leopards, of course considering all covid 19 precautions. This would be an exclusive 2 days/1 Night tour. A perfect package for beginners & nature enthusiasts who wishes to have a wild life experience clubbing along with nature & learn on field with proper guidance & practical sessions involved.

Pre Monsoon Season is here, It's right time to explore lush green jungles and get back home with blissful wild encounters & experience. A great season ahead and the wait to explore wildlife is never ending.

City’s biggest, brightest and most happening cyclothon is ready to hit the streets after 2 years. The Messengers on Cycles is the city’s most unique cyclothon to commemorate the birthday of Helen Keller and celebrate her indomitable spirit. People in tricycles and bicycles come together to not only ride, but race to spread awareness on a unique disability called Deafblindness within the city and the country. Sense International India along with more than 300 tri-cyclists and cyclists will fill the streets transforming into heroes riding for inclusion, education and support for children and adults with Deafblindness.

Andharban is one of the most beautiful gradual descend trek through dense forest. We will be walking on a ridge offering an awesome view of the Kundalika Valley and the mountain ranges of Tamhini ghat. Evergreen forest covers you with shade and countless waterfalls. The same valley is the origin of the Kundalika River famous for its white water river rafting.
 
Grade: Medium


Itinerary:
#Saturday,
23:00 - Start traveling in a bus from Andheri. Pickup through JVLR, Mulund, Navi Mumbai

#Sunday,
04:00 - Reach Pimpri village and rest in bus for sometime
05.00 - Start trek towards Andharban; Breakfast on the way
12.00 - Lunch Break at Hirdi
16:00 - Return to Pimpri dam and have tea
17:00 - Departure to Mumbai
21:00 - Reach Mumbai (tentatively)


Fees: Rs.1699
 - to be paid in advance 
 - Non-refundable if canceled within 48 hours before commencement.
 - 50% refundable if canceled at least 48 hours before trek

 - Traveling from Mumbai to base village and back in a private vehicle
 - Morning breakfast & tea
 - Lunch
 - Evening refreshments
 - Entry Charges
 
Excludes:

 - Any other charges not mentioned in \Includes\"

eventname: Wild IQ : Field studies and research concepts for children
description:
Introduction to ecological field studies and research concepts for children

Children naturally possess inquiring minds and we will help channel their inquiries to deeper insights and greater understanding. Kalinga Centre for Rainforest Ecology (KCRE), a biodiversity field station will be the base and catalyst in enabling children to observe, question and look at wilderness from a new perspective. 
To start with we will expose them to the Earth's oldest living ecosystems and its dynamics - the Western Ghats. Understanding these rainforests will offer a rare glimpse into the evolutionary and ecological potential of this magnificent landscape. Our experts will draw a scientific perspective to provide kids with a strong understanding of what makes these rainforests so significant. 
The learning process will entail teamwork, problem-solving capabilities, roughing it out in the field, data collection, time management, information synthesis, and using appropriate tools all under the guidance and mentoring by experts.

Duration: Three days hands on workshop 
Dates: 24th June 2022 to 26th June 2022
 
For more details and registration: 
https://kalingacre.com/wildiqfieldworkshop/

Contact: 
kalinga@kalingacre.com or call +91 9480877670

eventname: Reiten & Yoga - eine Pferdereise durch Rumänien
description:
REITEN & YOGA
Eine bewusste Reise durch Rumänien
10.-16. Juli 2022

Entdecke die Natur Rumäniens auf dem Rücken eines Pferdes und komme mit Yoga und Meditation zur Ruhe. ???? 

Diese Reise wird dich nicht nur Natur und Pferden näher bringen - sondern auch dir selbst. 

Die Reise beinhaltet:
- Reiten durch die Wildnis Transsylvaniens unter der Führung eines erfahrenen Guides
- Tägliche Yogastunden & Meditation
- Camping in der Natur mit Lagerfeuer und Sternenhimmel

Spontanität wird belohnt:
- Early bird: 750 € bei Buchung bis 31. Januar
- Regulär: 850 € bei Buchung ab dem 1. Februar
Die Kosten beinhalten ein Pferd, das du dir mit einer weiteren Person teilst, den Guide, die Yogastunden, das Essen und alles außer deinen Transport nach Rumänien.

Wir empfehlen dir, ein Pferd zu teilen, sodass du einen intensiven Kontakt mit deinem Pferd hast und zugleich auch die vielen anderen Aspekte deiner Reise genießen kannst.
Du bist sehr reiterfahren und möchtest ein Pferd ganz für dich alleine haben? Für einen Aufpreis von 300 Euro ist auch das möglich.

Organisatoren:
Ellen Sophie Fleißgarten (Yogalehrerin) und
Frank Kelleter (Guide & Coach)


Du fühlst dich gerufen? Melde dich bei uns und sei dabei! ✨

Alles Liebe
Frank und Ellen

Lashlifting ist neben der Wimpernverlängerung auch eine der beliebtesten Beautytrends. Für diese Schulung gibt es keine Voraussetzungen und ganz egal ob du aus der Beauty Branche kommst oder du einfach als Quereinsteiger oder Anfänger in der Beauty Welt Fuß fassen möchtest, diese Schulung ist für dich super geeignet.

Auf dem deutschen Markt gibt es immer mehr Beauty Bars, die Lash & Brow Lifting anbieten, und alleine durch diese zwei Behandlungen umsatzstark profitieren. Auch als Zusatzleistung z.B beim Friseur, im Nagelstudio, in Sonnenstudios oder andernorts sind diese zwei Trendbehandlungen ein profitables Zusatzgeschäft. Wir zeigen dir, wie du die Naturwimpern deiner Kundinnen dunkler, länger und voller aussehen lassen kannst – ganz ohne Wimpernverlängerung und ohne Wimpernzange. eventname: EDTech x Indian Education Congress & Awards 2022
description:
Welcome to the 1st regional Indian Education Congress 2022. Indian Education Congress has hosted its 12th annual edition, this time we are pleased to announce our regional editions starting from Chandigarh. A one-day conference where the delegates will be enlightened with insightful sessions in a specially crafted Peeer2Peer forum, where the torch bearers of the Indian and Global Education fraternity will speak their minds in an exclusive face-off to find uni-directional approaches that will usher crucial uprising trend among the community. Sessions and Panel discussions will focus on mapping and meeting future demand for technology in education, the growth of EdTech in India (and beyond) & the challenges faced by education entrepreneurs. How leading institutions have rapidly transitioned online? How have companies pivoted to maximize work-from-home models? The virtual classrooms, the multi-device any-time, anywhere learning / teaching scenarios and how to leverage them, new ways that are emerging and facilitating the assimilation of border-less education imparting opportunities across education segments...

The transformation has been quite rapid and the industry indicators are showing steady growth. More and more individuals and enterprises are playing prolific roles in adding value to the education system as a whole. Indian Education Awards 2022 will Identify, Showcase & Recognize the most promising Education & EdTech Brands of the Year 2022, for their outstanding contributions to transforming education through technology to enrich the lives of learners everywhere. The event will offer a bespoke networking platform to help you make new connections, share ideas, grow professionally, and discover solutions to today’s challenges. It’s the most premium gathering of education peers…people you can relate to, learn from, and stay connected to throughout the year.

DRIVE ELECTRIC EXPO is an International exhibition and conference on the entire EV Industry.

About this event

DRIVE ELECTRIC EXPO is an International exhibition and conference on the entire EV Industry. This exhibition will create a platform for all EV manufacturers, Battery Manufactures, Charging Point operators and the other allied EV services to come together and display their products for the entire West India Region. First 3 editions of DRIVE ELECTRIC EXPO will cover the entire Maharashtra Region and will take place in major cities like Mumbai, Pune & Nagpur. These 3 editions has the target of reaching more than 30,000+ visitors includes Dealers ,Franchise Owners, Commercial Property Owners, Real estate developers, Highway resorts & Hotels, Residential complexes to adopt EV trend in the coming years. This expo will be a great awareness of 100+ EV brands in 2W/3W/4W segments available in the market. This expo will be networking cum educational platform for the entire EV ecosystem.

Retreat To Incredible India!

Leaving Copenhagen the 4th November 2022 for an 9 day journey, broadening  your spiritual and  cultural horizon - and refining your yoga and meditation practice.

This journey takes you to the yoga capital of the world; Rishikesh.  Here we will practice in the pristine, green and lush area of Bhairava Nagar. Overlooking The Ganges and with the Himalayas surrounding us we will immerse ourselves in the traditions and ceremonies of Yoga.

Rishikesh has a long history of being home to Gurus, Saddhus and seekers - and is referred to as The Source by spiritual leaders. 

During the 9 day journey we will participate in a Puja ( cleansing ceremony) at the local Shiva Temple, we will visit ancient meditation caves, celebrate with the locals at the evening Aarti ( fire ceremony), we will visit Sattva Yoga Academy for a day of yoga and festivities as they host their annual Sattva Yoga Summit, we will walk up the Himalayas. And more!

Our accommodation is a gem hided away from the hustle and bustle of the amazing streets of Laksman Jhula. There we will be served homegrown, organic, vegetarian food. We will have our morning and evening practice here, taught by Kristina. And we will find rest in the double rooms facing The Ganges

Included in the packet;

Accommodation
Meals at the hotel  
All planned trips/excursions
All practices taught by Kristina


Not included;

Flight tickets & Transport to/from airport
( We recommend that everyone books the Finnair Flight from Copenhagen 4th November 13.05 arriving at Delhi 6.25 in the morning. We will arrange for transport in small bus to Rishikesh. Returning to Delhi the afternoon Saturday 12th to stay at hotel in the airport area the night before leaving at 8.10 Sunday morning the 13th)

Price in shared double room Kroner 8.900,-
Price in double room alone Kroner 10.200,-
Deposit Kroner 1000,- ( not refundable)

Mukteshwar is a pleasing destination situated at an elevation of 2,285 mts above sea level in Nainital district of Uttarakhand state. Mukteshwar got its name from a 350-year-old temple Mukteshwer Dham whose residing deity is Lord Shiva.
Mukteshwar is a village and tourist destination in the Nainital district of Uttarakhand, India. It sits high in the Kumaon Hills at an altitude of 2171 meters, 51 km from Nainital, 72 km from Haldwani, and 343 km from Delhi.

The top of the mountain on which Mukteshwar Temple stands offers astonishing and marvelous views of the imposing Himalayan range.

Our inspiration to bring this race to the people of Kumaon comes from the five Himalayan peaks (Nanda Devi, Nanda Kot, Nandaghunti, Trishul and Panchachuli) that are visible from Mukteshwar and from many points on the running route.

Race Categories

eventname: Indie - Kerala zwiedzanie, joga, taniec indyjski, wypoczynek nad morzem
description:
Warsztat jogi i tańca indyjskiego w Indiach.
Wszystko pod opieką polskiej pilotki mówiącej w hindi, tancerki oraz certyfikowanej nauczycielki jogi.

Kerala jest wymarzonym miejscem na odpoczynek, gdy w Polsce temperatury spadają i dzień staje się krótki. Słońce, błękitne niebo, intensywna zieleń bujnej egzotycznej roślinności, gaje palm kokosowych, pola ryżowe, szmaragdowe rozlewiska. Piaszczyste plaże przyciągają wielbicieli słońca i ciepłego morza. W głębi lądu plantacje herbaty i przypraw kuszą zapachami. Spokojny i jeden z bogatszych stanów w Indiach charakteryzuje się gościnnością i tolerancją. Organizowane festiwale zadziwiają przepychem i rozmachem. Kerala to też pyszna kuchnia, chyba jedna z najsmaczniejszych w Indiach.

Varkala – tu się zatrzymamy – jest niewielkim nadmorskim miasteczkiem, znanym z 15-metrowego czerwonego klifu nad szeroką piaszczystą plażą. To ciche, spokojne miejsce, z senną atmosferą w ciągu dnia, rozbudzające się przed spektaklem zachodzącego słońca.

ATRAKCJE w VARKALI
Oprócz codziennych lekcji jogi i tańca, spacerowania po plaży i leniuchowania w hamaku pod palmą, zapraszamy na opowieści o  indyjskiej „wiedzy o  życiu” czyli ajurwedzie. Dodatkowo można skorzystać z  zabiegów ajurwedyjskich, pójść na spektakl Kathakali albo na kurs gotowania po keralsku.

 REJS PO KANAŁACH – WENECJI WSCHODU. Na słynnych rozlewiskach tzw. backwaters, zobaczymy  bujną roślinność i  życie ludzi mieszkających wzdłuż  kanałów.
Pojedziemy na plantację herbaty i przypraw.


PLAN POBYTU:

    • Codzienne zajęcia jogi i medytacji
      Joga według  METODA B.K.S. IYENGARA, charakteryzuje się precyzją i dokładnością, kładzie nacisk na odpowiednie ustawienie ciała w asanach. Jest to doskonale narzędzie do poznawania ciała i jego rozumienia. Pomaga w rozwijaniu  uważności i obserwacji nas samych, naszych emocji. Buduje  siłę i elastyczności.
    • Codzienne zajęcia tańca indyjskiego. W zależności od zainteresowania uczestników taniec bollywood, taniec klasyczny, nauka gestów, choreografii. Dla większej gracji ruchów i dla dobrej zabawy.
      Zajęcia są dla wszystkich: praktykujących i tych, co jeszcze nie zaczęli. Niezależnie od poziomu zaawansowania, mamy nadzieję, że wszyscy po powrocie do domu będziemy cieszyć się większą elastycznością, lekkością i radością. Poczujemy mocny zastrzyk energii i dobre samopoczucie.

eventname: Leh Ladakh: A Trip Of Lifetime
description:
Juleh! Leh Ladakh Calling... Lets explore the picturesque landscapes of Ladakh, discover the most beautiful Pangong Lake and admire the many colorful monasteries, hills, valleys and snow-capped mountains of Leh on this wonderful tour.
Overview
Trip Starting From: Leh
Trip Location: Leh
Date : 13 to 19 Aug 2022


Treat yourself to 6 nights 7 days of beautiful and enchanted journey to Leh - Ladakh. Start your trip from the charming town of Leh, which will woo you with its quaint markets and charming palaces. Visit the beautiful Sham valley and the ancient monasteries, Magnetic Hill, Shanti stupa and many more.
Take a trip down to enchanting Nubra valley and visit the famous Diskit monastery and experience local culture at its best.
Lose yourself in the hypnotizing beauty of the colorful Pangong Tso and enjoy a memorable sunrise and sunset by the lake. A thrilling camel safari and drive through the highest motorable road in the world, seems just too good to be true!

• Day 1 - Arrival in Leh
 You will be arriving in Leh for your tour
 You will be picked up by our representative and be transferred to the hotel.
 After check in, it is advised that you take some rest in the day to acclimatize
 In the evening, you will be visiting the Shanti Stupa for a panoramic view of the Leh city and for a mesmerizing sunset
 Dinner and overnight in Leh hotel
• Day 2 - Sham Valley Excursion
 After breakfast this morning, we will be driving to witness the beautiful confluence of Zanskar and Indus.
 Post this, we will be taken to the famous Gurudwara Pathar Sahib for a spiritual experience
 Then the road takes you to the enigmatic Magnetic Hill, where you will witness the vehicle moving uphill even in the neutral gear
 Dinner and overnight in Leh Hotel
• Day 3 - Leh to Nubra Valley
 After a scrumptious breakfast this morning, we will be driving on the highest motorable civilian road in the world, on the Khardung La Pass
 From Khardung La top, you will have an uninterrupted and magnificent view of the Nubra Valley
 We will then drive to the white sand dunes of Hundar and you can experience riding a double-humped camel ride
 We will then check in to the Hotel, and if time permits, you will be visiting the Diskit monastery
 Dinner and overnight Stay in Nubra
• Day 4 - Back to Leh
 After breakfast this morning, we will be driving past the Khardung La top again
 After arriving in Leh, we can rest for a while before going out for visiting other local attractions
 Dinner and overnight in Leh hotel
• Day 5 - Leh to Pangong
 After Breakfast this morning, you will be driven towards the Indo-China border to visit the majestic Pangong Tso
 The lake is about 5 to 6 kms at its widest point and about a 160kms long, with 60% of its water in China
 The way to Pangong Tso passes over the Chang La Pass (17,585ft), which is an easy road despite the altitude
 At the foot of the pass is the ancient temple of Tangtse
 We will reach the Lake in late afternoon hours and as the time progresses, you will witness the lake changing colours
 We will stay in camps/Homestays on the shore of this lake surrounded by huge mountains
 Dinner and overnight Stay in Pangong
• Day 6 - Back to Leh from Pangong
 After breakfast and spending a couple of hours on the Lake's shore, we will be starting on our journey back to Leh
 Embark on your drive from Pangong to Leh through Changla
 On the way back, visit Thiksey Monastery as well. Also, visit the famous Shey Palace, Rancho School (3 idiot) and Gompa
 By late evening, We will arrive at Leh
 Dinner and overnight in Leh hotel
• Day 7 - Return
 This morning after breakfast, you will be transferred to the airport for your return flight

Cost :
18800/- per person
17800/- per person ( if 5 + people in a group)
Take time to do what makes your soul happy. Book your seat asap.

DarkGreen Adventures (#DGA) invites you for a mind-soothing trek to Bhimashankar via Ganesh ghat route. There are two main trek routes to Bhimashankar – Ganesh ghat and Seeri ghat. Ganesh ghat passes through tranquil forests of Bhimashankar. There are several waterfalls and lush green landscape on this route

Grade: Medium. You need to walk 25kms, uphill and downhill through the forest.

Saturday
23:30 - Pickup from Andheri, JVLR, Mulund and Navi Mumbai
 
Sunday:
04:00 - Reach base village. Have an introduction and briefing.
05:00 - Start trekking towards Bhimashankar. 
07:00 - Enjoy the waterfalls on the route. We will have packed breakfast on the way.
11:30 - Reach Bhimashankar, have lunch and get darshan in the temple.
13:00 - Start descending.
18:00 - Reach base village and start traveling back to Mumbai
21:00 - Reach Mumbai

Fees: Rs.1399
 - Non-refundable if canceled within 48 hours before commencement.
 - 50% refundable if canceled at least 48 hours before trek

Discounts:
 - Rs.100 for doing registration 10 days before the trip
 - Rs.100 per person for a group of 5 or more
 - You cannot combine these discounts i.e. max Rs.100.

Includes:
 -  Travel from Mumbai to base village and back in a bus
 - Forest entry charges in Bhimashankar region
 - Breakfast and refreshments
 - Lunch
 - Guidance and expertise charges

Excludes:
 - Bottled water/cold drinks
 - Anything not mentioned in ‘includes’
 
For payment through UPI - kuya@hdfcbank

For payment through Paytm or Google Pay: 9820285295

Contact:
Krishna: 9820285295 
 
Things to carry:
 - At least 2 litre water (preferably in personal reusable bottles)
 - Torches (other than mobile)
 - Good trekking shoes or sport shoes
 - Adequate rain protection for yourself and bag
 - We appreciate participants who carry healthy foods like dry fruits, Enerzal Powder, Energy bars etc.
 - A haversack to put everything. Sling bag not allowed in trek

eventname: Himalayas Winter Trek: 4 of World Tallest Peaks via Sandakphu & Darjeeling
description:
Journey to see ? ?? ??? ????? ??????? ?????! One of the best Himalayas winter treks.

Sandakphu Phalut: one of the few treks on earth where you can see four 8,000 m peaks. When you reach 3,636 m on Sandakphu, on your left is the Everest cluster. On your right, is the world’s 3rd highest peak, Kanchenjunga, standing with its family of peaks. This family of peaks is famously called The Sleeping Buddha.

This is a trekker’s paradise. Away from the routine city, this trek offers a chance to embrace the simple, peaceful, and joyous life of the remote hills. Untouched by human machinery, people revel in the quietude of these high peaks; unattainable and undisturbed. Enjoy the panoramic views Sandakphu provides of the very best that nature has to offer, including towering mountains, colorful orchids, and the mystical temperate forests.

??? ????????? is this? ? https://youtu.be/soSCLvcfn74 https://youtu.be/VF8zYb4qM_U

People visit Sandakphu majorly for trekking. A surreal trek, stretching over a long distance of tranquility and awe, the places in Sandakphu that are a must-visit are essentially pit stops in this epic journey.

????? ???????
Fully supported multiday Himalayas hike with daily stays in tea houses except for 1 nite in tents to capture the sunrise over the Sleeping Buddha [3rd highest peak with its family of peaks]. Extra 2 nights in Darjeeling - well-known for its tea industry, views of the world's 3rd-highest mountain, and the Darjeeling Himalayan Railway, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Include admission to Zoo (snow leopard ?) and HMI - Himalayan Mountaineering Institute.

????????? ?????:
1. Once 10 pax confirm with a deposit, departure is firm & we'll book flights.
2. Compulsory to buy travel insurance that covers COVID-19 related & 180 days before the trip date.
3. Only itinerary is fixed now, once dates & cost are finalized ready for sign up, it will be emailed via our meetup page

??? ?? ?????????
Participants should be relatively fit, and accommodating character - as our plan may be disrupted esp. being in the mountains areas. Weather & mountain road conditions are the 2 key factors. Although every effort will be made to stick to the given itinerary, ground conditions may change and cause some disruption or deviation.

Good for active beginners & regular hikers, definitely for all-mountain lovers. U must not have any medical conditions related to blood, lung or heart & should be living an active lifestyle or regular exercises in any form. Prior Himalayan trekking experience is advised. There are long and strenuous days in the trek. AMS can be managed even for anyone who has never done a high-altitude trek.

? Trek rating
DIFFICULTY: Moderate
HIGHEST ALTITUDE: 3,636 m
AVERAGE TEMPERATURE: 3-10 °C
???????? ?????????, ???????? & ??? ?????? ???? 

??? ?: ??????? ?? ??? ???? ???? – ????????
We will plan our Delhi to Bagdogra airport [IXB] flights in such a way so as to reach Bagdogra before 12pm. It takes 4-5
hours drive from Airport to base camp . There is no trekking today.

??? ?: ???????? ?? ???????
Altitude: 6,400 ft (1,951 m) to 9,450 ft (2,880 m) Time taken: 6-7 hours, 11 km . The first hour is through the jungle and then it opens up as we approach the first check post.

??? ?: ??????? ?? ??????????
Altitude: 9,450 ft (2,880 m) to 10,400 ft (3,170 m) Time taken: 6-7 hours, 13 km. Today we will walk through meadows without seeing a single person for hours. Thanks to the fact that Sandhakphu is not as easy as Manali to reach.

??? ?: ?????????? ?? ?????????
Altitude: 10,400 ft (3,170 m) to 11,950 ft (3,642 m) Time taken: 3 hours, 6 km. Today you will reach the highest point of your trek. My past trekkers say this evening was the most memorable; especially the sunset.

??? ?: ????????? ?? ?????????
Altitude: 11,950 ft (3,642 m) to 11,807 ft (3,599 m) Time taken: 7-8 hours, 14 km Trek gradient: Moderate. Today is going to be the toughest. You will probably reach the campsite by 3-4pm only. We will be having a packed lunch today out in the meadows.

??? ?: ????????? ?? ??????? ??? ??????
Altitude: 11,807 ft (3,599 m) to 7,546 ft (2,300 m) via 11,950 ft (3,642 m) Time taken: 6 hours, 16 km.
Even though today you will be walking the longest, you won’t feel as such as we will be walking through a variety of different landscapes: Jungles, meadows, riversides. And if you are super lucky, you might even see a Red panda too.

??? ?: ??????? ?? ????. ????????? ?? ??????????
Altitude: 7,546 ft (2,300 m) to 6,234 ft (1,900 m) Time taken: 4-5 hours, 15 km Difficulty: Easy, mostly level walks interspersed with a few ascents and descents.

??? ?: ???????? ?? ??? ????????? ???? ??????? - ??????????
Today we wake up late and step out to the Darjeeling Zoo to see the elusive and amazing leopards of all time. We will easily spend 2 hours without knowing where the time passed in this zoo.
After which, we will make a quick stop at the Himalayan Mountaineering Institute and see the history of mountaineering. Did you know Darjeeling has a small village with over 1000 Everesters ? Most of them go to Everest region for work in the season.

??? ? : ?????? ???? ?????????? ????? ??????? ?? ???????
Do ART in Delhi airport

The Humble Warrior anual ashram retreat. 

-- 7 days from £355 --

March 2023

Humble Warrior invites you to this #Ashram Yoga retreat in #Vrindavan, the place where #Krishna was said to have lived. This is a #Bhakti focused #Jivamukti retreat. #Bhakti (devotion), #Jnana (discernment), #Asana (postures), #Karma (service), #Dhyana (meditation) and #Pranayama (breath) will all be practiced over the week.

Take some time to dive deep into the practices of yoga. Reconnect to your inner stillness and fill yourself up spiritually mentally and physically with a wide variety of yoga tools. Connect to your body, your soul, your breath and come back to you. Fill your #heart with love and let the practices do the rest.
Ashram life will immerse you in a loving, family feeling community with bhakti practices many times a day. The ashram will provide you with 3 #veggie meals a day and AC or non AC rooms, sharing or single occupancy.

The city of Vrindavan is one of the most devoted cities in the world with the Maha Mantra (the Hare Krishna mantra) being chanted 24 hours a day for well over 70 years.

There will be a full program to choose from. Taking advantage of as much or a little as you like. #Aarti several times a day, a yoga class each day, dharma talks from the resident guru, karma yoga, tour of the other ashrams and temples.

Charlie Kelly, Humble Warrior teacher, will be leading the retreat with the help of the friends/devotees of the ashram.

description:
You’re invited to the MALDIVES Yoga & Wellness Adventure Retreat this JULY 21-26 - only TWO SPOTS LEFT!!

For this extra special yoga adventure retreat, we will have “Yacht-ccommodations” on a spacious “liveaboard” - aka a 3-story 92-foot boat with 10 rooms, 10 bath, sundeck, indoor/outdoor common areas, bar, etc!

As a 99% sea nation of 10k+ islands, an all-inclusive liveaboard retreat offers us a streamlined experience voyaging into some of the best scenery and adventures the Maldives has to offer. 

We’ll enjoy some activities on the boat - sleeping, meals, morning meditation & yoga on the sunroof - and more fun on different islands + sandbanks each day, with options for more adventures in the water if you like! :)

Check out this awesome video by @wonderingmate - thank you HUGELY for updating this video across so many years :)

YES, if you’ve heard me talk about retreats over the years, THIS is the one I’ve been waiting to put on… and SO worth the wait! 

I have just TWO spots left. 

TEN spots have already sold from my “first dibs” list of those who have expressed early interest in this specific retreat from past posts and stories. 

SEVEN of whom are RETURNING ATTENDEES!!

Those coming back for a second or third retreat with me…

From my very first retreat in Perhentian islands, Malaysia in 2017 to my 12th, most recent retreat in October in Santorini, Greece. I am so honored and excited to have another amazing group coming together!

So! Are YOU ready to join me on this ultimate paradise island vacation of your dreams?! 

Check out the details here to claim one of the last 2 spots before they’re snapped up! 

https://cynthiatravels.com/maldives-yoga-retreat/

Link also in bio. And please let me know asap if you’re considering!

Batches: 18th June; 25th June; 9th July

Lohagad is near Malavli station, which is just ahead of Lonavla. It divides the basins of the Indrayani and Pawna and is situated on a side range of the Sahyadris. The Visapur fort is located on its eastern side. The four large gates of Lohagad are still in good condition and reasonably intact. Historical records show that in the later Peshwa period, Nana Phadnavis (1742-1800 AD) built several structures in the fort such as a big tank and a step-well (bawali).

Grade: Easy

Brief Itinerary:
#Saturday midnight
11:30 - Pickup from Andheri, JVLR, Mulund, Navi Mumbai

#Sunday
03:30 - Reach Malavali and rest for sometime
05:30 - Have an introduction and start trekking. Breakfast on the way
08:30 - Reach Lohagad top and explore
09:30 - Start descending
11:00 - Go to the waterfall at base
12:00 - Have Lunch and then start traveling towards Mumbai
16:00 - Reach Mumbai. Same drop points

Fees: Rs.1299

Inclusions: 
 -.Travel till base village from Mumbai and back in a bus
 - Breakfast and tea
 - Lunch
 - Expertise charges

Exclusions: 
 - Bottled water/soft drinks
 - Anything not mentioned above

For payment through UPI: kuya@hdfcbank

For payment through Paytm or Google Pay: 9820285295

Contact:
Krishna: 9820285295 (Call/WhatsApp)
Ankit: 9920966368 (Call/WhatsApp)

Things to carry: 
 - 2 litre water (preferably in personal reusable bottles) 
 - Good trekking shoes or sport shoes 
 - An extra pair of dry clothes if you want to change in evening 
 - Plastic bags for dry items in your bag like clothes, electronics etc. 
 - A double strap bag. Sling bag not allowed in trek 
 - We appreciate people carrying juice packets and fruits like pears, pomegranate, dates etc.

Run along the gushing Ganga on historic trails under the lush green cover of forested area. All In Running camps offer the opportunity to experience distance running and adventure activities in the lap of nature. The camp is the perfect mountain getaway to spend time with loved ones over the long weekend. For beginners as well as advanced runners, explore the local trail network, sharpen your running skills and discover the physical, emotional and spiritual benefits of trail running.

PRICING:
For runners: INR 30,000 /-
For guests / family / friends): INR 13,000 /-
GST included

OFFERS:
We offer a discount for groups of 3 or more.

EVENT INFORMATION:
Details with itinerary: https://bit.ly/2XRc2Au
Location: Rishikesh, Uttarakhand, India
Duration: 4 days / 3 nights
Included: Stay and all meals, 3X trail runs, 1X rafting trip, local transportation (for activities), basic adventure insurance, t-shirts and gifts
Excluded: Travel to and from camp
Spots: Limited to 10 only

REGISTRATION:
Submit your details using the link given and we'll get in touch: https://bit.ly/3vlXQR2

CONTACT INFORMATION:
Phone: +91 98113 97774
Email: info@allinrunning.com

COVID-19 RELATED:
We are taking all the necessary precautions against the spread of COVID.
- Limited to small groups of 8-10 only
- All guests to get a RT-PCR test 72 hours from time of arrival
- Daily screening of staff and guests
- Physically distanced tents and living arrangements
- Regular disinfecting of common areas
- Use of face masks at outdoor gatherings

ABOUT All In Running Camps:
All In Running presents a first-of-its-kind series of camps that hope to celebrate trail running in the Indian outdoors while building a community of like minded runners. Through the camp, All In Running strives to encourage runners to explore, to connect with nature, to discover their potential and to push personal boundaries.
___________________________________

RunNiti

The Chitri Ultra Marathon 2022 is a one of the unique run in India held on 26th June 2022 viz. the early season of Monsoon. The run will help participants to test and push their own limits of fitness and endurance and give them the confidence to take on the challenge of running long distances.

Race format
• Participants can choose any category as per their choice.
• Runners can register to participate in different categories – 12 Hour Run, 50 KM, 75 KM and 100 KM.
• Participants need to cover the total distance of their chosen category in respective cut off category.

Registration
Please read privacy policy and Dos and Don'ts section carefully before registration
• Registrations will be open from 1st January – 31st May (midnight).
• On successful registration and payment using the link below, participants will receive a confirmation mail with their registration ID.
• Some part of the registration fees collected will be utilised towards the RunNiti Foundation – Sports for All. The amount collected will be used to purchase sports material which will be distributed to relevant NGOs to support those in need.

What's in it for me?
• Test your fitness and push your endurance.
• Gain the confidence to challenge your limits and run long distances.
• On successful completion of the run, win a T-shirt, e-certificate, and a virtual personalized photo frame to immortalize your achievement.
• Complete the race within given stipulated time and win a medal too.

General Instructions
• Accommodations for Registered Participant Only (Not Family) and Food is Included in this Ticket Price (for Sat and Sun)
• Participants will be required to follow all the prevailing rules and directives set by the government and organizers from time to time.
• Participants to make sure that they do not break the protocol of maintaining Social Distance.
• All registered participants will receive a confirmation email and SMS with a link to the form, on which they should upload their running data after completing their activity.
• Participants should run only in their selected category and not exceed the distance.
• Participants to warm-up well before the run and also to cool down and stretch post-run and keep them hydrated.
• Do not participate if you are have any medical conditions. Event organizers/promoters are not responsible for your health and safety.

Other Fun Elements:
Tent Stay Evening Breakfast,
Dinner (Veg / Non-Veg) – Unlimited,
Karaoke Night
Campfire,
Fun Games,
Morning Breakfast
Lunch
Evening Breakfast

Note:
Tickets are non-refundable & non-transferable.
Takeaways (Medal, Certificate, T-Shirt) will be presented to you at Venue only (No Courier/Home Delivery).

Eligibility Criteria for 12 Hour Individual Run, Ultra 50 and 75 KM & Ultra 100 KM

• Participant must have completed a Marathon [42.195kms] within 5 hours 30 mins in the past 2 Years [1st Jan 2019 - till Event date], and should display a valid timing certificate.
*Personal Run Assisting Gadgets will not be taken into account for the final calculation of laps or distance.

How to Get There?
Google Map Link: https://g.page/ChitriAdventure?share

By Bus : Kolhapur - Ajara - Chitri Dam - Awandi Village - Chitri Adventure Resort (Approx. 90 kms from Kolhapur)
Ajara - You will get Private Cab / Auto to reach there.


More Details Please feel to free contact us at WhatsApp Number: 9096620371

RunNiti Team

Jotiba Dakkhan Hill Half Marathon 2022- Edition 3 will be taking place at ensconced on a hill at a height of 3124 feet above sea level, 18 km to the north-west of Kolhapur city, Jotiba Temple. Jyotiba, the holy shrine of Lord Kedarnath up in the hills near the bustling city with its true Maratha flavour. It is not for nothing that Jyotiba is called the ‘The King of the Deccan’. Throughout the year the deity draws devotees in huge numbers.

The route was scenic with greenery all around, wide and clean roads. The runners will start from the area of temple and make their way through the scenic curvy route.

While Sundays are special for visiting this temple, this would be first kind of sports event happening at this place on 21st August 2022. With smear ‘gulal’ (pink coloured sacred powder) on everyone’s foreheads and everywhere else turning the whole mountain into a beautiful pink.

We believe this event will go a long way in further promoting running in this place and encourage a fit and healthy lifestyle.

For more details: www.runniti.com

ज्योतिबाच्या नावानं चांगभलं !!!

Malshej Ghat Monsoon Half Marathon 2022 - Edition 4 (held in Malshej Ghat is a mountain pass in the Western Ghats range in the Thane-Pune district of Maharashtra, India.) 

It is the only event in the place of Malshej Ghat. It is not just a Running event but also it is our endurance to spread Social message about Plant Trees.

Malshej Ghat Monsoon Half Marathon route consist of most scenic locations alongside the beautiful Pimpalgaon Joga Dam and Harishchandra Gadh.

The route promises to be full of lush Greenery, Natural Beauty region, Fog, Drizzling Rain, Rivers, Hills in the view, Water streams and Water Falls. The excitement of Running over the Ghat + Trail + Village Track will definitely bring an enjoyable experience. On one side you will pass green fields, farms and on the other side you will have the Pimpalgaon Joga Dam water reservoir area. Small villages on route will add beauty in your run.

Malshej Ghat Monsoon Half Marathon 2018 is a Trail + Ghat Run with 21 KM (Half Marathon), 10 KM Challenge Run and 5 Fun Run in paradise with a route.

This year's event to be held on 24th July 2022 !

Whether you choose to run or walk; whether you choose the half marathon or 3-KM walk or anything in between, you won't find reason to complain. And of course, as usual we have loads of entertainment.

NO CASH PRIZES. WINNERS WILL GET TROPHIES, ALONG WITH THEIR FINISHER'S MEDALS.

Doon Monsoon 10k Run 2022 (2nd Edition) | 14th August 2022 | Dehradun | 10k, 5k & couple Run



Thrill Zone brings to you the 2nd edition of Doon Monsoon 10k Run 2022. Slated for 14th August 2022. 


It is a well-known fact that The monsoons kicks in Dehradun during the month of July and continue till September. At this time the weather in Dehradun is neither too hot nor too cold. It's a very pleasant experience to run or have a stroll at this time in Dehradun. Hence, we choose such a date so that participants can experience the pleasant weather and, if they get lucky, they might get a cooling rainfall

Thrill Zone:- (Organized By)

Thrill Zone is the brainchild of P.C. Kushwaha and its official roots are in Dehradun. The main aim of Thrill Zone is to promote a fit and healthy lifestyle. It was established in 2014 and has been in operation since then. Team Thrill Zone executed 86 events, we at Thrill Zone have made our presence felt across the nation and promoted the cause of healthy living. After successfully organizing running events in cities like Mumbai, Bangalore, Haryana, Himachal Pradesh, Delhi, Pune, Punjab, Noida, Chandigarh, Ahmedabad, Roorkee, Lucknow, among others, our organization is now a Pan India organization.

10K Couple Run/Walk:- 10k couple walk/Run Participants (Runner and Partner both) will get a T-Shirt, Medal, Certificate, Refreshments, Energy drink, Hydration Support, BIB with Timing Chip, a Chunni to tie the hands of the couple.

Note:- Top 3 Couples will be selected winners on the basis of the timing of both the partners, this is not an individual run you have to start and finish at the same time as both the partner's hands will be tied up with Chunni, there is no age category, only top 3 Couples will be selected as winners.  

Couple Run/Walk:- This one is for all lovey-dovey couples who like to do everything together, even running. While running together couples can get a chance to spend quality time with each other, away from the everyday problems of handling their families.

5K Soulmate Run (Timed Run):- Any pair can run in the soulmate run irrespective of gender or relationship like brother-sister, mother-kids, friend-friend.

Having read this waiver and knowing these facts and in consideration of your accepting my entry, I, for myself and anyone entitled to act on my behalf, waive and release the Thrill Zone, the group of Runners of India, all event sponsors, their representatives and successors from all claims or liabilities of any kind arising out of my participation in this event, even though that liability may arise out of negligence or carelessness on the part of the persons named in this waiver. eventname: Shakti Power Awakening - Retreat i Varkala i Södra Indien
Yoga and meditation retreat in Rishikesh
description:
Treat yourself with six days of yogic odyssey in the yoga capital of the world, Rishikesh. 

From the 24th to the 30th of June, we will take you on a journey of ancient learning infused with scientific methods. 

We will impart you with a fundamental understanding of various techniques of yoga like Hatha, Ashtanga and Vinyasa flow and cleanse the mind and body via Jal Neti. You would be learning how to balance your energy through various breathing and pranayama techniques along with meditation methods such as Yog Nidra and Tratak. With knowledge of yoga philosophy, we create a physical, mental and emotional harmony which leads us to happy, healthy and peaceful life. A glimpse of Ayurveda : the ancient Indian medical practice. 

All of this through teachers @rishikulyogshalarishikesh with knowledge of yogic science and therapeutic yoga with decades of experience, who acquired this age-old wisdom passed down to them by gurus.

Join us to embark on a deeply enriching yoga week to balance your body, mind and soul.  Contact +919958166007 ☎️ #yoga #yogaretreats #yogaforeverybody #yogainspiration #yogalove #yogagram #yogajourney #yogalifestyle #yogaphotography #yogaretreatsrishikesh #rishikesh #yogatraining #yogaposes #ashtanga #ashtangayoga #ancientlearning #yogaschool #yogicphilosophy #yogicpractice #yog #meditation #yognidra #yognidrameditation #yogatherapy #therapeuticyoga #ayurveda #ayurvedicmassage #ashtanga #hatha
