description:
JIC India trip in partnership with tour operater JUSTIFI.


2 age tracks:  25-45 and 45-60



Our India trip starts in Delhi, the bustling home to 20 million people, continues up on the edge of the Himalayas to the village that is home to the Dalai Lama, and concludes in Amritsar, the capital of the Panjabi region on the Pakistani border. Justifi arranges all the logistics (domestic transportation, accommodations, meals) as well as fantastic educational experiences with Justifi staff and local Indian guides. Dandeli Wildlife Sanctuary, known for its dense forests, is home to animals including black panthers, bison, sloth bear, bonnet macaque, elephants, leopard cats, civets, porcupines and our national animal- tiger. More than 300 species of birds including 4 types of hornbill have been recorded here. Reptiles in the park include the king cobra, spectacled cobra, Russell's viper, saw-scaled viper, common krait, Indian rock python, rat snake, vine snake, bamboo pit viper and monitor lizards.
The sanctuary provides rafting opportunities at the Virnoli Rapids connected to the KaliRiver. Other activities include jungle walks, water-zorbing, bird watching, crocodile spotting etc.


Itinerary:
#Saturday,
19:00 - Start traveling from Mumbai in an AC Volvo bus (sleeper). 
23:00 - Pickup from Pune

#Sunday, 
08:30 - Reach Dandeli and have breakfast
10:00 - Crocodile park excursion
12:00 - Reach our cottages and freshen up. 
14:00 - After lunch we can go for a nature walk in the jungle
16:00 - We will go for evening Jeep Safari in Anshi National Park
19:00 - Dinner and then some gupshup or night walk in forest

#Monday, 
06:00 - Morning Jeep Safari or walking on bird watching trail 
09:00 - Breakfast and then checkout
12:00 - We will do river rafting, water zorbing, water zipline etc. in Kali river
17:00 - Return bus for Mumbai/Pune

#Tuesday,
07:00 - Reach Mumbai


Fees: Rs.10,500 only
 - Half non-refundable if cancelled at least 7 days before trip
 - Non-refundable if cancelled in last 7 days to trip
 - You can get travel discount of Rs.3000 if you report directly at Dandeli

Fee Includes:
 - Travel from Mumbai/Pune to Dandeli and back in AC Volvo sleeper bus
 - Local transport in bus/auto/jeep etc.
 - Accommodation on triple sharing basis in cottages
 - All meals from Sunday breakfast to Monday Evening refreshments
 - River Rafting, Water Zorbing, Water Zipline (one time each)
 - Jungle Safari in Jeep, Nature Walk in Forest
 - Crocodile Park Excursion

Fee Excludes:
 - Food during bus journey from Mumbai to Dandeli and back
 - Bottled water/drinks during trip
 - Anything not mentioned in ‘Includes’

**** Nature Safari - 1-Day trip to Paradise ****

A One Day journey through nature's paradise will tentalise 
your senses, will soothe and heal your soul and help you find 
true joy. A must event for photographers, nature lovers and 
all those who need a break from stressful and boring life. 
Come find love and happiness with Nature. 
Join Nomads on this incredible event, one of it's kind.

----------------------------

EVENT DETAILS: 

Date- 17th Sep 2022,Saturday

Cost: Rs 1500

Start from Andheri by 11:30 pm on Sat night (22nd Sep) and 
Return by 7:30 pm on Sun evening (23rd Sep)

In this unique event of it's kind Nomad's will take you to 
some of nature's most beautiful and exotic locations in the 
Kalsubai-Harishchandragad-Ratangad Santuary regions of the 
Sahyadris. We will take you through a 50 km stretch of this 
region which has some of the most beautiful sites. It is a 
paradise for photographers and a must visit for all nature 
enthusiasts. The region offers some of the most enthralling 
and equisite scenery's that will fill your heart with love 
for nature. We will reach the starting point (Shendi) and 
proceed from thereon towards an incredible journey and will 
see some of these most amazing sites while on the move. 


Join us on this incredible Nature's Safari !!! 


Locations we will see on the move or visit include - 

1) Kalsubai Mountain Range (Bari)
2) Bhandardara Dam (Shendi)
3) Arthur Lake
4) Kokan-Kada (Ghatghar)
5) Sandhan Valley and Reverse-fall point (Samrad)
6) Amruteshwar Temple ( Ratangad)
7) Necklace Falls
8) Nanhe Falls
9) Pabargad and Bikini Point (Mutkhel)
10) Randha Falls 


Inclusion : 

* Travel cost - Andheri to Paradise & Return by non ac 
private bus
* Morning Snacks
* Lunch 
* Travel expertise, guide & first-aid charges.

key points of the trek 

A striking Himalayan massif tucked away in the beautiful Rupshu Valley of Ladakh, Mentok Kangri is an enticing challenge for adventurers. Standing tall at 20,834 ft, it offers unmatched views of the Changthang peaks, reflected in the turquoise waters of Tsomoriri Lake. The dreamy landscape of Ladakh, exotic wildlife species and the unbeatable views of the lofty neighbours weave the Mentok Kangri trek!

Mentok Kangri expedition offers a striking contrast of trekking in a dry coldest desert valley while providing mesmerizing views of Ladakh & Zanskar ranges, the 21,000 ft Kang Yissay and the 20,086 ft Stok Kangri peaks.

•  The trek brings an unmatched vantage point to the beautiful Tsomoriri Lake that it overlooks.

•  Thrill of climbing a six thousander!

•  Spot elusive wildlife species like the Tibetan Gazelle, Mentok Kangri, Tibetan Wolf, Mountain Goat, Blue Sheep, Black Necked Cranes, to name a few.

A lot more details will be shared soon...

❑❑❑এবারের প্ল্যানিংঃ
◘০৯ ই জুলাইঃ রাতের বাসে ঢাকা থেকে ভারতের কোলকাতার উদ্দ্যেশে ঢাকা ত্যাগ।
◘২০ শে জুলাইঃ দুপুরের বাসে কোলকাতা থেকে ঢাকা রওনা।  

❑❑❑ইভেন্ট ফিঃ ৩১৯৯৯/- টাকা (জনপ্রতি)
❑❑❑ট্রিপের সময়ঃ ১২ রাত ১১ দিন
❑❑❑ইভেন্টের ধরনঃ রিল্যাক্স বাট জার্নিফুল ট্রিপ।
❑❑❑সদস্যের ধরনঃ বিগিনার এবং ইন্টারমিডিয়েট
❑❑❑টিম সদস্য সংখ্যা ঃ ০৭ জন।

❑❑❑কনফার্ম করার নিয়মাবলীঃ

◘শিমলা ১ রাত, মানালী ২ রাত, দিল্লী ১ রাত হোটেলে ৩/৪ জন শেয়ার ব্যাসিসে থাকা।

আমাদের এই ইভেন্টে অংশ গ্রহন করতে হলে অবশ্যই যে কথাগুলো আপনার মনে রাখতে হবেঃ
*** এই ট্রিপটি কোন ট্রেকিং ট্রিপ না হলেও এই ট্রিপটি একটু এক্সপ্লোর টাইপের ফুল রোড জার্নি টাইপ ট্রিপ। এই ট্রিপে টানা ২-৩ ও জার্নির উপর একাধিক বার থাকা লাগবে। আপনার জার্নি করতে কোন সমস্যা থাকলে অবশ্যি এই ট্রিপ আপনার জন্য নয়। 
*** এই ট্রিপটি যেহেতু বেশির ভাগ সময় জার্নির উপর থাকা লাগবে তাই অনেক সময় খাবারের কোন ঠিক ঠিকানা থাকবে না । উপস্থিত সময়ে ধারের কাছে যা কিছুই পাওয়া যাবে সেগুলো দিয়েই উদরপূর্তি করা হবে তাই আপনার খাওয়া দাওয়া নিয়ে কোন সমস্যা থাকলে অবশ্যই এই ট্রিপ আপনার জন্য নয়। 
*** এই ট্রিপটির যদিও সব বাস এবং ট্রেনের টিকিট আগের থেকেই কনফার্ম করা থাকবে কিছু কিছু ক্ষেত্রে বেশ কিছু কাজ ইন্সটান্ট করা হবে সময় এবং পরিবেশ বুঝে তাই এই সংক্রান্ত কারো আপত্তি থাকা যাবে না । 
*** আপনি যদি ঘুরতে গিয়ে শুধু খুত খুজতে থাকেন মানে কমপ্লীন টাইপের হোন তাহলে আগে থেকেই আপনি এই ইভেন্ট এড়িয়ে চলুন। 
*** এই ট্রিপে বেশ কিছু সিদ্ধান্ত ইন্সটান্ট নেয়া হবে সময় এবং পরিস্থিতি বুঝে। এই ক্ষেত্রে গ্রুপ হোস্ট সকলের সাথে আলোচনা সাপেক্ষে যেই সিদ্ধান্ত নিবেন সেটাই মেনে নিতে হবে এতে কোন ওজর আপত্তি চলবে  না।  

*** প্রাকৃতিক যে কোন জটিলতায় সবাই হেল্পফুল থাকতে হবে সে ক্ষেত্রে ইভেন্ট ফি এর বাহিরেও যদি এক্সট্রা কোন খরচ হয় সেটা সবাই সমানভাবে দিতে হবে।

❑❑❑প্ল্যানে যে কোন ধরনের চেঞ্জ হতে পারে। প্ল্যানে পরিস্থিতির উপর বিবেচনা করেই চেঞ্জ করা হবে। এতে এডমিনদের সিদ্ধান্তই চুড়ান্ত সিদ্ধান্ত। এতে কোন ওজর আপত্তি চলবে না।

Trek to Kurdugad in Raigad district, This fort was a watchtower for the trade routes towards Konkan coastal region, also known as Vishramgad. The fort. The fort was built during the reign of Shivaji Maharaj, The Peshawas took the control of Kurdugad fort but lost its importance during the British rule. The fort was later brought into restoration by Dattoba Pasalkar, a descendant of Baji Pasalkar.
 
We start the trek early in the morning from the Umbardi village, hiking through the plains and then gradually ascending towards the plateau where a hamlet is named pethwadi. Over here we come across a Kurdai temple and then the steep ascent to the fort. Upon reaching the fort there are rock-cut stairs and traverse towards Bastion named Hanuman Buruj, later proceed towards Needhe which is the main attraction of this fort. On the trail, we also come across a very massive groove which is very fascinating. 
 
 
Attractions of the trek:
Hanuman idol at Hanuman Buruj.
Needhe of Kurudgad.
Very huge Groove.
Magnificent views of the Konkan mountain range.
Homemade Maharashtrian food.

Trek facts:
Grade: Easy, Endurance: Low- Moderate, Highest Elevation: 575M, Trek Distance: 9 KM Approx.


Itinerary:
DAY 0
Depart by hired vehicle from Borivali East, SGNP at 10:30 PM with pickup points at Goregaon, Andheri, Bandra, Dadar, Chembur, Vashi & Panvel. ( exact locations will be shared with the registered participants)
.
DAY 1

Reach Base village - 04:30 AM tentatively
Fresh up & Breakfast at base village - 1 hour.
Introduction & Event Briefing - 15 minutes.
Ascent trek to Kurdugad from the base village - 2 hours approx.
Explore Kurdugad - 1 hour.
Descent trek to the base village - 2 hours approx.
Lunch break at villager’s house - 1 hour.
The return journey to Mumbai - 5 1/2 hours.

Expenses:
₹1400 per head, Inclusive of transport from Mumbai by hired AC seater vehicle, Breakfast, Veg Lunch, and our expertise.

Excluded: personnel expenses like cold drinks, snacks, packaged water bottles.

How to Register:
Step -1: Book your seat through online payment on our website or manual payment like Gpay to our UPI ID/ NEFT to RamblersIndia Current Account.  
Step-2: After seat confirmation, you will be requested to fill up the Mandatory participation disclaimer form and select the preferable pickup location.
Step -3: Now your participation is confirmed & we will create a WhatsApp group on the day of the event for coordination. 
 
Checklist
What to Wear:
Trekking shoes/ hiking boots.
Full sleeve synthetic/ polyester t-shirt/ shirt.
Full-length hiking trousers/ track-pant.
Things to Carry:
Pack the following things in a hiking daypack:
Minimum 2 liters of water.
Food items like fruits, dry fruits, energy bars, healthy snacks.
Cap, Bandana.
Spare set of clothes, extra pair of socks (pack them in a separate bag).
Toiletry kit, sunscreen lotion & mosquito repellent.
Windcheater/ Sweater, flip flops during travel.
Litter bag for non-biodegradable (plastic) litter.
Spare face masks, Hand Sanitizer.
Personal medicines.
Identity Proof.


Instructions:
After payment, a registered participant will need to fill up the mandatory disclaimer online form with accurate details else will be asked to refill by the event host.
Please do not cause delay and cause inconvenience for others and impact the schedule.
Under 18 years of age must take the consent of the parents for participation.
Participants will be notified before when the itinerary is modified/the event gets canceled due to any unforeseen circumstances.
If there is any unexpected change in weather during the event, we have the right to cancel/postpone or arrange at an alternate location.
Participants are liable to bear/pay for the expenses that are not mentioned in the expenses.
The event schedule may delay or advance due to unforeseen conditions, hence timings aren't mentioned except for the event start, end time.
Alcohol consumption/smoking tobacco/W**d is strictly prohibited. Will be expelled from the event if found in consumption.
Please do not litter any plastic (biscuit pack covers, candy wrappers, etc). We are highly committed to a zero trace policy.
The washroom facility is available at the base village.
Participants should coordinate, be disciplined and align together as a team during the event.
Please do not expect luxury facilities and appreciate being cooperative with fellow ramblers.
Though we assure safety as a top priority, event organizers are not responsible for any severe injuries or fatalities.
No group discount is applicable.
We rely on third-party payment gateways to make the registration process simple and easy, it also includes the convenience fee along with the event fee which is to be borne by the participant during check out.
If a participant cancels their registration one day before the event or on the day of the event, a refund of 40% is paid, Refer to the Payment & Refund Policy on our website.
No refund will be provided if the participant doesn't show up on the day of the event.

eventname: Julley…Musafirs motorcycle expedition to Ladakh: 28th June-10th July, 22
description:
It’s riding season once again, and you know what that means – we’re going to Ladakh.

It’s one of those special, almost sacred journeys that bikers dream of since the day they discover their passion for riding. And we pride ourselves on having made this dream come true for hundreds of riders since our first Ladakh ride in 2013.

This year is extra special. Especially because we’ve been forced to stay away from leisure travel due to the pandemic, we know how desperately we want to feel the crisp, cold Ladakhi air against our sunburnt cheeks, ride on occasionally non-existent roads with the mighty Himalayas watching over us. Just you, your machine, and the vast expanse of an unseen world. Exposed to the elements, immersed in the region’s rusticity. It doesn’t get better than this, we promise!

So join us for this epic adventure and make memories you will cherish for the rest of your life. The journey isn’t for the fainthearted, but that’s the charm. It’s difficult, but it’s worth every ounce of discomfort you endure. And the Musafirs will be right by your side, leveraging our longstanding expertise with this treacherous terrain to guide you, cheer you, and protect you. Come, let’s ride together – because that’s the only way we know. With us, you’ll always have someone to watch your back and bring you home. Experience the difference that our 11-years motorcycling legacy and experience bring to the table.

The only downside is that we always sell out pretty quickly once we announce our Ladakh rides. We keep our groups small to encourage bonding and ensure maximum safety of all our riders, so don’t wait on this one. It’s a now or never kind of ride so register today and experience the unparalleled thrill of riding on top of the world.

The Ride Plan – Key Highlights:
28 June is when we’ll meet you at Jammu with your bike! From here, we do a short ride to the accommodation. Here we discuss the plan for the next 12 days and prep you up for the challenges and memories that will make you smile even in your afterlife.

On this ride you’ll experience:

Sonamarg.  Known as the Meadow of Gold, Sonmarg is the gateway to Ladakh and is known for its verdant and picturesque valleys and snow-clad peaks.
Chenani Tunnel. The longest road tunnel in India. Riding through this fairly new tunnel, that’s more than NINE kilometers long is an experience in itself. And what awaits a few kilometers on the other side is the famous rajma chawal – desi ghee with anaardaana chutney at Peerah (google it!)
Zozi La. The first high-mountain pass you’ll be riding through on this route … and if lucky, you may experience snow!
Kargil War Memorial. This war is memorial situated at Dras at the foothills of Tololing Hills. We bet you’ll not come out of this place without tears in your eyes.
Leh.
Diskit-Nubra. You’ll ride through the Khardung La to reach here – it’s probably the only place in India where your camera will capture — Snow-capped peaks, a huge sand desert, a river, and double-humped camels in the same shot. Mesmerizing — to say the least.
Siachen Base Camp.  At 12K feet visit the OP BABA SHRINE located at the SBC.
Merak. No roads and an amazing view of the Pangong Tso.
Hanle. Hanle, in the Changthang valley, has a scenic landscape that is unique even to Ladakh — and it boasts of one of the world’s highest observatories. Very close to the Indo-China line of actual control. ILP-dependent.
Tso Kar. Another less frequented high-altitude lake — is known for various rare species sightings.
Baralacha La and the ATAL Tunnel. Few places simply need no introduction.
Officially, the ride ends once we touch Chandigarh on the 10th of July.

Peace of Mind
In tow with our convoy, throughout the ride, we will have a support vehicle – not an Innova or a Scorpio but a proper bolero camper that can carry your whole bike and you in case of a breakdown or any other uneventful situation. Thus, you can focus only on experiencing the terrain and enjoy the adrenaline rush.

Aligning the Stars
We understand that 2 weeks of leaves is a problem in your corporate office and you’ll need permission from your boss, spouse, parents, kids, etc … keeping this in mind, we’ve designed a unique 13-day ride so “Leaves not approved” does not stop you from experiencing this epic adventure. The ride begins on a Tuesday and ends on a Sunday.

Fine Print:
The Himalayan terrain is unpredictable – landslides, roadblocks, snow, cloud bursts etc., may result in last-minute change of route and staying at unplanned locations.

Even in disruption, you are to stick together and we will have your back.

However, the expenses of unfactored distance covered by the support vehicle and of unplanned lodging boarding due to terrain disruptions will be split among all the participants.

Commercial “tour operators” will not say this until the disruption has occurred and levy an untransparent additional cost… but we aren’t one of those commercial tour operators. We are the Musafirs Motorcycle Club. Experience the difference!

The Bold Print
We are an inclusive club – your age, gender, caste, religion, profession, sexual orientation, etc., does not matter. What matters the most is the head and heart that drives the machine and the soul! We strictly follow the no-drug and no-litter policy – if you can’t adhere, please F.O. That’s exactly how serious we are when it comes to these. 

The Ride Plan
Jammu – Sonamarg – Leh – Nubra – Saichen Base Camp – Turtuk – Pangong Tso – Hanle – Tso Kar – JIspa – Naggar – Chandigarh.

To register for the ride
Call Shona: 9821178718  Nicc: 9819897843 or Birju (Ride Manager) : 9619056660 just to have a chat on how to prepare and then register for the ride.

eventname: Musafirs ride to the Untouched Spiti Valley : 18th – 26th June , 2022
description:
Join an adventure that will soothe your soul – a motorcycle ride to untouched Spiti valley. The valley is inaccessible during winters, the beauty unadulterated; the thrill of riding this part of the Himalayas is unparalleled.

Every day of the ride will be a new experience – continuous hairpin bends and amazing roads on a few days; and complete off-roading with riding under waterfalls, up a river, and passing through the World’s Most Treacherous Roads on others. The ride promises to deliver an experience incomparable to any other.

Come, let’s ride together – because that’s the only way we know. With us, you’ll always have someone to watch your back and bring you home. Experience the difference that our 11-years motorcycling legacy and experience bring to the table.

The Ride Plan – Key Highlights:
18 June is when we’ll meet you at Chandigarh with your bike! From here, we do a short ride to stay like royalty at a heritage fort converted into a hotel. Here we discuss the plan for the next nine days and prep you up for the challenges and memories that will make you smile even in your afterlife.

On this ride you’ll experience:

>The green pastures of Chitkul – the last Indian village along the border.
>A 1000+-year-old monastery at Tabo – the oldest, continuously operating monastery
>The view from the highest altitude village in Asia – Komic and be able to send a postcard to your loved ones from the world’s highest post office at Hikkim
>Seek blessings at GueStupa – famous for the mummy of a Buddhist monk that’s more than 500 years old
>Off-roading to ChandraTaal. “Taal” means a lake and as the name suggests this one is the shape of a crescent. It’s one of the few high-altitude lakes in India and the inaccessibility has preserved it’s beauty.

Officially, the ride ends once we touch Chandigarh on the 26th of June. You can ship your bikes out the same night via Gati/Safe Express and fly out or you could choose to extend the trip and do the Leh circuit with us. 

Details of our Leh Ride plan coming up on the website soon.

Peace of Mind :
In tow with our convoy, throughout the ride, we will have a support vehicle – not an Innova or a Scorpio but a proper bolero camper that can carry your whole bike and you in case of a breakdown or any other uneventful situation. Thus, you can focus only on experiencing the terrain and enjoy the adrenaline rush.

Aligning the Stars :

We understand that you’ll need permission from your boss, spouse, parents, kids, etc … keeping this in mind, we’ve planned it such that you’ll only be missed for ONE WEEK. The ride begins on a Saturday and ends on a Sunday – so you’ll need just a week of chutti from office and house chores ? .

And if you don’t have a bike but still want to experience it with the Musafirs, we could help you with rental bike options, connect with us if you wish to rent a bike.

Fine Print:

The Himalayan terrain is unpredictable – landslides, roadblocks, snow, cloud bursts etc., may result in a last-minute change of route and staying at unplanned locations.

Even in disruption, you are to stick together and we will have your back.

However, the expenses of unfactored distance covered by the support vehicle and of unplanned lodging boarding due to terrain disruptions will be split among all the participants.

Commercial “tour operators” will not say this until the disruption has occurred and levy an untransparent additional cost… but we aren’t one of those commercial tour operators. We are the Musafirs Motorcycle Club. Experience the difference!

The Bold Print :

We are an inclusive club – your age, gender, caste, religion, profession, sexual orientation, etc., does not matter. What matters the most is the head and heart that drives the machine and the soul! We strictly follow the no-drug and no-litter policy – if you can’t adhere, please F.O. That’s exactly how serious we are when it comes to these. 

The Ride Plan :

Chandigarh – Theog –  Sangla – Chitkul – Kalpa – Tabo – Kaza – Losar – Chadartal – Naggar – Chandigarh.

To register for the ride :

Call Shona: 9821178718  Nicc: 9819897843 or Birju: 9619056660 just to have a chat on how to prepare and then register for the ride.

અમારો મખ્ય ઉદેશ :-
#ગરીબ અને માધ્યમ વર્ગ ના વિદ્યાર્થીઓ આનો લાભ લાઈસકે.
#આ કોર્ષ કર્યાબાદ તેઓ પોતાના પગપર ઉભારહી શકે.
#આ કોર્ષ કર્યાબાદ તેઓ સ્વાવલંબી બનીશકે.
#સમગ્રવિશ્વમાં નાની મોટી નામાંકિત કંપનીમાં નોકરી કરી શકે.
#વિદ્યાર્થી ને ગારમેન્ટ ખોલવી હોય તો પણ ખોલીસકે
#વિદ્યાર્થી ને .બ્યુટીક ખોલવી હોય તો પણ ખોલીસકે.
#કોર્ષ કર્યાબાદ તેઓ પોતાનો બિજ્નેશ પણ ચાલુ કરીશકે.
#કોર્ષ બાદતેઓ સરકારી કે અર્ધ સરકારી તમામ પ્રકારની સહાય લઈ શકશે.
#કોર્ષ બાદ તેઓ આર્થિક સ્થિતિ સુધારી શકે છે.
#પોતાનું તથા પોતાના કુટુંબ નું ભારણપોસણ પણ કરી શકેછે.
#સમાજના નીચલા વર્ગ ને આર્થિક દ્રષ્ટિએ ઉંચુ લાવવામાં આ કોર્ષ ખુબજ ઉપયોગી છે.
#આ કોર્ષ સીખવાથી તેઓ પોતાની કાળમાં વિવિધતા લાવીશકેછે.
# સંસ્થા ના તાલીમાર્થી ને મશીન ખરીદવાની સહાય આપવામાં આવેછે.
#સંસ્થા ના તાલીમાર્થી ને સરકારી સબસિડીવાળી લોન ની સહાય આપવામાં .આવે છે.
#સંસ્થા ના તાલીમાર્થી ને કોટેશન ની સહાય આપવામાં આવેછે।
#ફેશનડિઝાઈનર , #મોડલિંગ , #ડાન્સિંગ #સિંગિગ #એક્ટિંગ ની સહાય આપવામાં .આવે છે.
#તમામ પ્રકારની સ્વરોજગારી ઉભી કરવામાટે ની તમામ માહિતી ની સહાય આપવામાં .આવે છે.

આપણા ભાઈ -બેન - ફ્રેંડ્સ - ફેમિલી - કે અન્ય ને કોર્ષ કરી પરીક્ષા આપી સરકાર માન્ય સર્ટિફિકેટ મેળવી ઉજ્વળ કારકિર્દી બનાવવી હોય તો આ માહિતી ને વધુ લોકો સાથે ફોર્વડ કરો અને આ માહિતી ને દરેક મિત્ર તથા પરિવારજન સુધી પહોંચાડવા વિનંતી.

મેં મારી શિક્ષિત ભારત ના નાગરિક હોવાની ફરજ પુરી કરી હવે તમારો વારો છે.

મીત્રૉ સ્નેહીઓ અને શુભેચ્છકો આપ સૌના સાથ અને સહકારથી અમારી સંસ્થા હેઠળ જણાવેલા કોર્સ ની શરૂઆત તારીખ 1 થી થાય છે .
તો આપ સૌને પહેલા તે વહેલા ના ધોરણે ફોર્મ ભરાવી આ યોજનાનો લાભ લેવા વિનંતી.

Rabaricoloni 

તમામ બહેનો અને ભાઈયો ને વિનંતી કે તેઓ કોર્ષ કરી પરીક્ષા આપવા માંગતા હોય તો માત્ર। ... અમારીજ સંસ્થામાં આપવી

આપણા ભાઈ -બેન - ફ્રેંડ્સ - ફેમિલી - કે અન્ય ને કોર્ષ કરી પરીક્ષા આપી સરકાર માન્ય સર્ટિફિકેટ મેળવી ઉજ્વળ કારકિર્દી બનાવવી હોય તો આ માહિતી ને વધુ લોકો સાથે ફોર્વડ કરો (આ માહિતી ને દરેક મિત્ર સુધી પહોંચાડવા વિનંતી.)

ફેશન ડિઝાઇનીંગ, સીવણ ક્લાસ, ગારમેન્ટ, ડ્રેસ અને બ્લાઉઝ એક્સપર્ટ, સરકાર માન્ય સર્ટિફિકેટ કોર્સ
કોર્સ ને લગતી 100% સામગ્રી સંસ્થા દ્વારા ફ્રી આપવામાં આવશે.

આ કોર્સ ના ફાયદા:
- ગુજરાત રાજ્ય ના તમામ યુવક / યુવતીઓ માટે રોજગારલક્ષી તાલીમવર્ગો
- નોકરી મેળવવામાં સહાય
- સીવણ ગારમેન્ટ કોર્સ ફ્રી
- ફેશન શો માં પાર્ટિસિપેટ
- પોર્ટફોલિયો મેકિંગ
- ઇન્ડસ્ટ્રી એક્ષપર્ટ દ્વારા પર્સનલ કોચિંગ
- હાઉસ વાઇફ, કોલેજ સ્ટુડન્ટ & નોકરિયાત માટે સ્પેશ્યલ બેચની વ્યવસ્થા
- ફ્લેક્ષીબલ ટાઇમિંગ

વહેલા તે પહેલા ના ધોરણે એડમિશન આપવામાં આવશે.

અડ્રેસ:
RABARICOLONI 

#ભારત દેશ ના તમામ યુવક/યુવતીઓ માટે રોજગાર લક્ષી તાલીમ વર્ગો તથા નોકરીની સહાય।
#ફેસનટેક્નોલોજી બેજીક એન્ડ એડવાન્સ મશીનીંગ ટેક્નિક ની તાલીમ।
#તેના પરિણામ રૂપે અમારી સંસ્થા દ્વારા બધાજ વિદ્યાર્થીઓને ગુજરાત કે ગુજરાત બહારની નાનીમોટો નામાંકિત કંપનીમાં સારામાંસારો પગાર મળીરહે તેવી સહાય।
#1 તારીખ થી નવી બેચ ચાલુ થતી હોવાથી વહેલાતે પહેલા ધોરણે ઇન્ટરવ્યૂ ની તારીખ ફોર્મ ભરવાની તારીખ અને સમય પત્રક માં કોર્ષ માં સંખ્યા પૂર્ણ થાયે ફેરફાર થાઈસકે છે.
#તાલીમ રેસીડેન્સીયલ પ્રકારની હોય સંસ્થા દૃવારા સંસ્થા ના નીતિનિયમ અનુસાર ઘરે આવીને પણ શીખવાડવામાં આવેછે।
#સ્પેશ્યલ બેચ ની પણ વ્યવસ્થા કરવામાં આવેછે।

અમારો મખ્ય ઉદેશ :-
#ગરીબ અને માધ્યમ વર્ગ ના વિદ્યાર્થીઓ આનો લાભ લાઈસકે.
#આ કોર્ષ કર્યાબાદ તેઓ પોતાના પગપર ઉભારહી શકે.
#આ કોર્ષ કર્યાબાદ તેઓ સ્વાવલંબી બનીશકે.
#સમગ્રવિશ્વમાં નાની મોટી નામાંકિત કંપનીમાં નોકરી કરી શકે.
#વિદ્યાર્થી ને ગારમેન્ટ ખોલવી હોય તો પણ ખોલીસકે
#વિદ્યાર્થી ને .બ્યુટીક ખોલવી હોય તો પણ ખોલીસકે.
#કોર્ષ કર્યાબાદ તેઓ પોતાનો બિજ્નેશ પણ ચાલુ કરીશકે.
#કોર્ષ બાદતેઓ સરકારી કે અર્ધ સરકારી તમામ પ્રકારની સહાય લઈ શકશે.
#કોર્ષ બાદ તેઓ આર્થિક સ્થિતિ સુધારી શકે છે.
#પોતાનું તથા પોતાના કુટુંબ નું ભારણપોસણ પણ કરી શકેછે.
#સમાજના નીચલા વર્ગ ને આર્થિક દ્રષ્ટિએ ઉંચુ લાવવામાં આ કોર્ષ ખુબજ ઉપયોગી છે.
#આ કોર્ષ સીખવાથી તેઓ પોતાની કાળમાં વિવિધતા લાવીશકેછે.
# સંસ્થા ના તાલીમાર્થી ને મશીન ખરીદવાની સહાય આપવામાં આવેછે.
#સંસ્થા ના તાલીમાર્થી ને સરકારી સબસિડીવાળી લોન ની સહાય આપવામાં .આવે છે.
#સંસ્થા ના તાલીમાર્થી ને કોટેશન ની સહાય આપવામાં આવેછે।
#ફેશનડિઝાઈનર , #મોડલિંગ , #ડાન્સિંગ #સિંગિગ #એક્ટિંગ ની સહાય આપવામાં .આવે છે.
#તમામ પ્રકારની સ્વરોજગારી ઉભી કરવામાટે ની તમામ માહિતી ની સહાય આપવામાં .આવે છે.

આપણા ભાઈ -બેન - ફ્રેંડ્સ - ફેમિલી - કે અન્ય ને કોર્ષ કરી પરીક્ષા આપી સરકાર માન્ય સર્ટિફિકેટ મેળવી ઉજ્વળ કારકિર્દી બનાવવી હોય તો આ માહિતી ને વધુ લોકો સાથે ફોર્વડ કરો અને આ માહિતી ને દરેક મિત્ર તથા પરિવારજન સુધી પહોંચાડવા વિનંતી.

મેં મારી શિક્ષિત ભારત ના નાગરિક હોવાની ફરજ પુરી કરી હવે તમારો વારો છે.

મળવાનો સમય સવારે 9 થી સાંજના 5 સુધી (સમય બાદ આવવું નહિ.)

મીત્રૉ સ્નેહીઓ અને શુભેચ્છકો આપ સૌના સાથ અને સહકારથી અમારી સંસ્થા હેઠળ જણાવેલા કોર્સ ની શરૂઆત તારીખ 1 થી થાય છે .
તો આપ સૌને પહેલા તે વહેલા ના ધોરણે ફોર્મ ભરાવી આ યોજનાનો લાભ લેવા વિનંતી.

Rabaricoloni 

તમામ બહેનો અને ભાઈયો ને વિનંતી કે તેઓ કોર્ષ કરી પરીક્ષા આપવા માંગતા હોય તો માત્ર। ... અમારીજ સંસ્થામાં આપવી

આપણા ભાઈ -બેન - ફ્રેંડ્સ - ફેમિલી - કે અન્ય ને કોર્ષ કરી પરીક્ષા આપી સરકાર માન્ય સર્ટિફિકેટ મેળવી ઉજ્વળ કારકિર્દી બનાવવી હોય તો આ માહિતી ને વધુ લોકો સાથે ફોર્વડ કરો (આ માહિતી ને દરેક મિત્ર સુધી પહોંચાડવા વિનંતી.)

ફેશન ડિઝાઇનીંગ, સીવણ ક્લાસ, ગારમેન્ટ, ડ્રેસ અને બ્લાઉઝ એક્સપર્ટ, સરકાર માન્ય સર્ટિફિકેટ કોર્સ
કોર્સ ને લગતી 100% સામગ્રી સંસ્થા દ્વારા ફ્રી આપવામાં આવશે.

આ કોર્સ ના ફાયદા:
- ગુજરાત રાજ્ય ના તમામ યુવક / યુવતીઓ માટે રોજગારલક્ષી તાલીમવર્ગો
- નોકરી મેળવવામાં સહાય
- સીવણ ગારમેન્ટ કોર્સ ફ્રી
- ફેશન શો માં પાર્ટિસિપેટ
- પોર્ટફોલિયો મેકિંગ
- ઇન્ડસ્ટ્રી એક્ષપર્ટ દ્વારા પર્સનલ કોચિંગ
- હાઉસ વાઇફ, કોલેજ સ્ટુડન્ટ & નોકરિયાત માટે સ્પેશ્યલ બેચની વ્યવસ્થા
- ફ્લેક્ષીબલ ટાઇમિંગ

વહેલા તે પહેલા ના ધોરણે એડમિશન આપવામાં આવશે.

અડ્રેસ:
RABARICOLONI 

#ભારત દેશ ના તમામ યુવક/યુવતીઓ માટે રોજગાર લક્ષી તાલીમ વર્ગો તથા નોકરીની સહાય।
#ફેસનટેક્નોલોજી બેજીક એન્ડ એડવાન્સ મશીનીંગ ટેક્નિક ની તાલીમ।
#તેના પરિણામ રૂપે અમારી સંસ્થા દ્વારા બધાજ વિદ્યાર્થીઓને ગુજરાત કે ગુજરાત બહારની નાનીમોટો નામાંકિત કંપનીમાં સારામાંસારો પગાર મળીરહે તેવી સહાય।
#1 તારીખ થી નવી બેચ ચાલુ થતી હોવાથી વહેલાતે પહેલા ધોરણે ઇન્ટરવ્યૂ ની તારીખ ફોર્મ ભરવાની તારીખ અને સમય પત્રક માં કોર્ષ માં સંખ્યા પૂર્ણ થાયે ફેરફાર થાઈસકે છે.
#તાલીમ રેસીડેન્સીયલ પ્રકારની હોય સંસ્થા દૃવારા સંસ્થા ના નીતિનિયમ અનુસાર ઘરે આવીને પણ શીખવાડવામાં આવેછે।
#સ્પેશ્યલ બેચ ની પણ વ્યવસ્થા કરવામાં આવેછે।

તમારામાં રહેલી કોઈપણ આવડત ને નિખારવા અમારી સન્સ્થા નો કોર્ષ કરી સરકાર માન્ય પ્રમાણ પત્ર ( સર્ટિફિકેટ ) લઈ નોકરી નો લાભ લૉ.

અમારો મખ્ય ઉદેશ :-
#ગરીબ અને માધ્યમ વર્ગ ના વિદ્યાર્થીઓ આનો લાભ લાઈસકે.
#આ કોર્ષ કર્યાબાદ તેઓ પોતાના પગપર ઉભારહી શકે.
#આ કોર્ષ કર્યાબાદ તેઓ સ્વાવલંબી બનીશકે.
#સમગ્રવિશ્વમાં નાની મોટી નામાંકિત કંપનીમાં નોકરી કરી શકે.
#વિદ્યાર્થી ને ગારમેન્ટ ખોલવી હોય તો પણ ખોલીસકે
#વિદ્યાર્થી ને .બ્યુટીક ખોલવી હોય તો પણ ખોલીસકે.
#કોર્ષ કર્યાબાદ તેઓ પોતાનો બિજ્નેશ પણ ચાલુ કરીશકે.
#કોર્ષ બાદતેઓ સરકારી કે અર્ધ સરકારી તમામ પ્રકારની સહાય લઈ શકશે.
#કોર્ષ બાદ તેઓ આર્થિક સ્થિતિ સુધારી શકે છે.
#પોતાનું તથા પોતાના કુટુંબ નું ભારણપોસણ પણ કરી શકેછે.
#સમાજના નીચલા વર્ગ ને આર્થિક દ્રષ્ટિએ ઉંચુ લાવવામાં આ કોર્ષ ખુબજ ઉપયોગી છે.
#આ કોર્ષ સીખવાથી તેઓ પોતાની કાળમાં વિવિધતા લાવીશકેછે.
# સંસ્થા ના તાલીમાર્થી ને મશીન ખરીદવાની સહાય આપવામાં આવેછે.
#સંસ્થા ના તાલીમાર્થી ને સરકારી સબસિડીવાળી લોન ની સહાય આપવામાં .આવે છે.
#સંસ્થા ના તાલીમાર્થી ને કોટેશન ની સહાય આપવામાં આવેછે।
#ફેશનડિઝાઈનર , #મોડલિંગ , #ડાન્સિંગ #સિંગિગ #એક્ટિંગ ની સહાય આપવામાં .આવે છે.
#તમામ પ્રકારની સ્વરોજગારી ઉભી કરવામાટે ની તમામ માહિતી ની સહાય આપવામાં .આવે છે.

આપણા ભાઈ -બેન - ફ્રેંડ્સ - ફેમિલી - કે અન્ય ને કોર્ષ કરી પરીક્ષા આપી સરકાર માન્ય સર્ટિફિકેટ મેળવી ઉજ્વળ કારકિર્દી બનાવવી હોય તો આ માહિતી ને વધુ લોકો સાથે ફોર્વડ કરો અને આ માહિતી ને દરેક મિત્ર તથા પરિવારજન સુધી પહોંચાડવા વિનંતી.

મેં મારી શિક્ષિત ભારત ના નાગરિક હોવાની ફરજ પુરી કરી હવે તમારો વારો છે.

મળવાનો સમય સવારે 9 થી સાંજના 5 સુધી (સમય બાદ આવવું નહિ.)

મીત્રૉ સ્નેહીઓ અને શુભેચ્છકો આપ સૌના સાથ અને સહકારથી અમારી સંસ્થા હેઠળ જણાવેલા કોર્સ ની શરૂઆત તારીખ 1 થી થાય છે .
તો આપ સૌને પહેલા તે વહેલા ના ધોરણે ફોર્મ ભરાવી આ યોજનાનો લાભ લેવા વિનંતી.

સર્ટિફિકેટના ફાયદા :-
#સરકારમાન્ય
#નોકરીમેળવવામાંટે
#બિજ્નેશકરવામાટે
#ધંધોકરવામાટે
#સરકારીસબસીડીવળીલોનલેવામાટે
#જ્યાં જરૂરજણાય તે દરેક જગ્યાએ
#સરકારીઅર્ધસરકારી કે પ્રાઇવેટ નોકરી કરવાવાળા પણ પ્રમોશન લેવા માટે આ પરીક્ષા આપી શકે છે

વધુ માહિતી માટે નીચે જણાવેલ સરનામે રૂબરૂ સંપર્ક કરવો
સરનામું :- 
Rabaricoloni 

તમામ બહેનો અને ભાઈયો ને વિનંતી કે તેઓ કોર્ષ કરી પરીક્ષા આપવા માંગતા હોય તો માત્ર। ... અમારીજ સંસ્થામાં આપવી

આપણા ભાઈ -બેન - ફ્રેંડ્સ - ફેમિલી - કે અન્ય ને કોર્ષ કરી પરીક્ષા આપી સરકાર માન્ય સર્ટિફિકેટ મેળવી ઉજ્વળ કારકિર્દી બનાવવી હોય તો આ માહિતી ને વધુ લોકો સાથે ફોર્વડ કરો (આ માહિતી ને દરેક મિત્ર સુધી પહોંચાડવા વિનંતી.)

ફેશન ડિઝાઇનીંગ, સીવણ ક્લાસ, ગારમેન્ટ, ડ્રેસ અને બ્લાઉઝ એક્સપર્ટ, સરકાર માન્ય સર્ટિફિકેટ કોર્સ
કોર્સ ને લગતી 100% સામગ્રી સંસ્થા દ્વારા ફ્રી આપવામાં આવશે.

આ કોર્સ ના ફાયદા:
- ગુજરાત રાજ્ય ના તમામ યુવક / યુવતીઓ માટે રોજગારલક્ષી તાલીમવર્ગો
- નોકરી મેળવવામાં સહાય
- સીવણ ગારમેન્ટ કોર્સ ફ્રી
- ફેશન શો માં પાર્ટિસિપેટ
- પોર્ટફોલિયો મેકિંગ
- ઇન્ડસ્ટ્રી એક્ષપર્ટ દ્વારા પર્સનલ કોચિંગ
- હાઉસ વાઇફ, કોલેજ સ્ટુડન્ટ & નોકરિયાત માટે સ્પેશ્યલ બેચની વ્યવસ્થા
- ફ્લેક્ષીબલ ટાઇમિંગ

વહેલા તે પહેલા ના ધોરણે એડમિશન આપવામાં આવશે.

અડ્રેસ:
RABARICOLONI 

#ભારત દેશ ના તમામ યુવક/યુવતીઓ માટે રોજગાર લક્ષી તાલીમ વર્ગો તથા નોકરીની સહાય।
#ફેસનટેક્નોલોજી બેજીક એન્ડ એડવાન્સ મશીનીંગ ટેક્નિક ની તાલીમ।
#તેના પરિણામ રૂપે અમારી સંસ્થા દ્વારા બધાજ વિદ્યાર્થીઓને ગુજરાત કે ગુજરાત બહારની નાનીમોટો નામાંકિત કંપનીમાં સારામાંસારો પગાર મળીરહે તેવી સહાય।
#1 તારીખ થી નવી બેચ ચાલુ થતી હોવાથી વહેલાતે પહેલા ધોરણે ઇન્ટરવ્યૂ ની તારીખ ફોર્મ ભરવાની તારીખ અને સમય પત્રક માં કોર્ષ માં સંખ્યા પૂર્ણ થાયે ફેરફાર થાઈસકે છે.
#તાલીમ રેસીડેન્સીયલ પ્રકારની હોય સંસ્થા દૃવારા સંસ્થા ના નીતિનિયમ અનુસાર ઘરે આવીને પણ શીખવાડવામાં આવેછે।
#સ્પેશ્યલ બેચ ની પણ વ્યવસ્થા કરવામાં આવેછે।

વધુ માહિતી માટે 9157697394 આ નંબર પર વૉટ્સઍપ કે કોલ કરી શકો છો.
આપણા ભાઈ, બહેન, ફ્રેન્ડ્સ કે ફેમેલીમાં કોઈ પણ ને ઉજ્જવળ કારકિર્દી બનાવવી હોય તો આ માહિતી વધુને વધુ લોકો સાથે ફોરવર્ડ કરો.

description:
June 29, 2022
Chennai India
Teacher – Ana Brandt
Assistance –  Falguni Kharwa
Limited to 10 students
830am-1230pm

Signup: https://www.anabrandteducation.com/workshop-products/p/chennai-india-baby-clinic-june-29-2022

—Students will receive An Apron, Mask, and Yoga Socks–
The Purpose of the Baby Clinic is to focus on Posing, Wrapping, Angles and Light

Studio Light – Profoto

Each student will be taught and directed on angles, white balance, camera settings, focal lengths.

We will use beanbags, baskets or buckets and bowls! Ana teaches IN – ON – OVER

(having a baby IN something (basket), ON something (beanbag) and OVER (bucket)

Students can photograph babies and use the images for their portfolio.

These Clinics are for ALL levels, from the very new to the experienced who  needs inspiration, motivation and perhaps some new ideas.

Ana packs her own baby clothes, props, layers and items to show how she creates her usual work.

Megérkezünk a Maldív-szigetekre a Velana Nemzetközi Repülőtérre, ahonnan gyorshajóval körülbelül 90 perc alatt átvisznek a Dél-Ari atoll keleti részén fekvő Dhangethi szigetre. A szigeten több vendégház közül választhatunk. Általában a szálláshoz reggeli jár, a többi étkezést saját magunknak megoldjuk az éttermek egyikében. A szigeten strandolhatunk, vagy akár bérelhetünk katamarán vitorlást, kenut, vagy jetskit.
A búvárhajó napi 3 merülésre fut ki, ebből 2 délelött és egy délután történik.
Ide bármilyen kombinációban lehet a csatlakozni.

A szállások egy éjszakára vetített költsége 65-90 USD között mozog szobánként (reggelivel), ehhez még hozzájön az étkezés, ami nagyjából 30 USD/nap/fő. A gyorshajó oda-vissza költsége 100 USD.
Egy 10 merülésből álló búvárcsomag 500 USD.

Most November végén és December elején több hetet kint töltünk a Maldív-szigeteken, és tetszőlegesen lehet hozzánk csatlakozni.

A kint tartózkodás ideje alatt nyílt vízi búvártanfolyamot és egyéb tanfolyamokat is tartunk igény szerint SSI és PADI rendszerben.

eventname: Családi nyaralás és búvárkodás a Maldív-szigeteken
description:
Megérkezünk a Maldív-szigetekre a Velana Nemzetközi Repülőtérre, ahonnan gyorshajóval körülbelül 70 perc alatt átvisznek a Rasdhoo atollba. A szigeten több vendégház közül választhatunk. Általában a szálláshoz reggeli jár, a többi étkezést saját magunknak megoldjuk az éttermek egyikében. A szigeten strandolhatunk, vagy akár bérelhetünk katamarán vitorlást, kenut, vagy jetskit.
A búvárhajó napi 3 merülésre fut ki, ebből 2 délelött és egy délután történik.
Ide bármilyen kombinációban lehet a csatlakozni. 

A szállások egy éjszakára vetített költsége 65-90 USD között mozog szobánként (reggelivel), ehhez még hozzájön az étkezés, ami nagyjából 30 USD/nap/fő. A gyorshajó oda-vissza költsége 80 USD.
Egy 10 merülésből álló búvárcsomag 500 USD. A NITROX töltés ingyenes.

Most November végén és December elején több hetet kint töltünk a Maldív-szigeteken, és tetszőlegesen lehet hozzánk csatlakozni.

A kint tartózkodás ideje alatt nyílt vízi búvártanfolyamot és egyéb tanfolyamokat is tartunk igény szerint SSI és PADI rendszerben.
Himalayas, Rishikesh

eventname: My Sacred India Journey III - Retreat de Yoga & Calatorie in Sudul Indiei cu Monica Filip
description:
MY SACRED INDIA JOURNEY - RETREAT DE YOGA SI CALATORIE IN SUDUL INDIEI CU MONICA FILIP
EDITIA A III-A
20-30 OCTOMBRIE 2022 
(For English scroll down)

Vino sa descoperi Sudul Indiei intr-o calatorie pregatită cu suflet si intoarce-te cu o experienta despre care inima isi va aminti tot restul vietii!
Ne asteapta doua locatii unice, dintre cele mai spirituale locuri de pe Pamant !

Imbinam pelerinaje la temple si pesteri sacre, pe urmele marelui intelept Ramana Maharshi, cu clase de yoga si meditatii zilnice, la poalele Munte sfant Arunachala - in Tiruvannamalai si ne rasfatam cu relaxare ayurvedica, pe malul Oceanului Indian - in Auroville.
.

DESTINATIILE NOASTRE

• Muntele Arunachala sau Muntele lui Shiva are o impresionantă incarcatură energetică masculină, fiind denumit și Inima Spirituală a Lumii, cautat de pelerini din toate colturile lumii!

• 8 temple mici (lingams) sunt aranjate in jurul Muntelui Arunachala si reprezinta fiecare, cea mai pură energie astrală a planetelor.
Un lingam corespunde fiecăruia după data nașterii, iar acest frumos pelerinaj te ajută să îți vindeci dificultățile aduse de propria karma.

• Peșterile Sacre și Ashram-ul unde a trăit marele iluminat al Indiei Sri Ramana Maharshi ,autor al : Who am I? spunea: Realizarea propriului Sine este cel mai mare serviciu pe care il poți aduce acestei lumi. (Mai multe in cartea India Secreta- Paul Brunton, de la care a si pornit calatoria mea in aceste locuri).

• Ajungem pe malul Oceanul Indian in Auroville - oraș protejat UNESCO, ce continuă să existe ca un experiment, aici s-au mutat si traiesc in armonie oameni din 58 de tări.

Un loc nascut din convingerea ca putem trăi cu toții impreună, in armonie , indiferent de naționalitate, sex , rasă, politică sau religie.

• MatriMandir (Templul Mamei) este o impresionantă sferă arhitecturală construită pentru meditație si regasirea sinelui , din care vei ieși fără cuvinte, cu o pace interioară aparte.

• Plajele Golfului Bengal ne vor mangâia respirația cu briza oceanului in clasele noastre de yoga, cu răsărituri si apusuri spectaculoase.

Răsfăț pentru Corp, Minte si Suflet zilnic:
-Clase de yoga in locații speciale cu Monica
-Clase de meditatie ghidata
-Pranayama- exercitii de respiratie in zona montana si pe malul Oceanului Indian
-Clasa de terapie prin sunete – Sound Bath
-Clasa de kirtan - terapie prin mantre
-Mese vegetariene delicioase, specifice bucătăriei sudiste
-Masaje si terapeutice ayurvedice, masaj acvatic Watsu (optionale)


Călătoria Include :

• 10 zile , 9 nopți
• 4 nopti cazare in camera dublă, in Tiruvannamalai
• Mic dejun inclus la locatia  din Tiruvannamalai
• Cina de Bun Venit
• 5 nopți in cameră dublă, in Auroville
• Mic dejun inclus la locatia din Auroville
 •Cina de Bun Ramas
• Transferuri aeroport
• Transport privat intre locatii (tuk tuk in oras & microbuz intre locatii , max. 2,5 ore)
• Ghid turistic permanent
• Toate intrările la temple
• Toate clasele de yoga, meditatii , soundhealing si kirtan ghidate de Monica si de invitatii ei locali

• Vizita la fabrica de produse naturale Maroma din Auroville, unde poti vedea cum se fabrica betisoarele parfumate pentru meditatie, lumanarile, dar si sa iti iei cu tine acasa produse pentru corp si casa 100% ecologice, fairtrade.

Investitia ta 1400 Euro
Inscrierea se face cu un avans de 400 Euro, iar diferenta poate fi achitata pana pe 15 Septembrie in maxim doua transe. *Inscrierea nu este returnabila*

Pachetul NU include :

Biletele de avion ( ex Bucuresti - Chennai si retur aprox 690 euro)
Viza turistică (gratuita la acest moment)
Asigurare medicala
Mesele din afara locatiilor (aprox 5$/masa)
Masaje ,tratamente ayurveda (aprox. 30$ optional)
Cumparaturi personale.

* Intrucat tin foarte mult la energia grupului si la o atmosfera primitoare pentru fiecare participant ce face aceasta calatorie, inscrierea se face in baza unui interviu de acceptare.

Scrie-mi : yogabymonicafilip@gmail.com

Te astept intr-o calatorie ce iti va ramane in inima toata viata!

ENGLISH
MY SACRED JOURNEY INDIA RETREAT EDITION II

When was the last time you did something for yourself ?
Come to discover Southern India, with a Journey for the Soul !
This trip combines pilgrimage to temples and sacred caves,
daily yoga classes in unique locations ,relaxation time with massages and therapies in a ayurvedic center right on the beach of the Indian Ocean.
Two locations, are waiting for us, to the mountain (Arunachala – in Tiruvannamalai) and to the ocean ,(in Auroville ) one of the most spiritual places on Earth!

OUR DESTINATIONS
• Arunachala Mountain or Mountain of Shiva has a tremendous masculin energy, also named the Spiritual Heart of the World, visited by people from all over the world!

• 8 Lingams Temples
Arranged around the mountain ,each temple represents the purest energy of each planet. Your birthday corresponds with one of them, and this beautiful pilgrimage will help you to release from the difficulties of your karma.

• The Sacred Caves and Ashram where Ramana Maharshi had lived – one of the most iluminated people and the author of Who Am I? – More about in the book Secret India by Paul Brunton.

• We arrive at Indian Ocean in Auroville – a UNESCO township founded on human unity regardless of color, gender,nationality, religion or race, where people from 58 countries are continuing to leave in harmony and peace.

• Matri Mandir (Temple of The Mother) – An impressive arhitectural sphere in the centre of Auroville ,created for meditation and self discovery, where from you are getting out speachless, with a beautiful peace.

• Bengal Bay beautiful beaches with spectaculare sunrises and sunsets, just perfect for our yoga classes and to sit by the Mother Ocean for the last five days of our Sacred India Journey Retreat!

• Visit to the manufacture Maroma in Auroville, a fair trade products, as candles , home fragrances ,body care and scented sticks.

Delights for Body, Mind and Soul:
Daily yoga classes in unique places with Monica
Meditation, Pranayama
Sound Bath – class with tibetan bowls and Kirtan Class with Monica
Vegetarian delicious meals
Ayurvedic massages, therapies, Watsu acvatic massage (optionals)

Our Journey Includes:
10 days, 9 nights
4 nights , double occupancy in Tiruvannamalai
4 Breakfasts at the location in Tiruvannamalai
Welcome Dinner
5 nights , double occupancy in Auroville
5 Breakfasts at the location, in Auroville
Goodbye Dinner
Transportation from and to airport
Local private transportation between locations ( 2,5h drive)
All temples entrances
All yoga & meditation classes guided by Monica
The Soundbath Healing class and
Kirtan Class - mantras singing by Monica's local guests

Your investment : 1400 euro
Package Not includes :
Fly tickets to Chennai and back to your country
(ex. Bucharest - Chennai tur retur aprox 690 euro )
Tourist Visa (free now)
Health insurance
Meals outside the locations (aprox. 5$)
Watsu massage,other therapies ,(aprox. 30$ optionals)

Reservation with minim 400 Euro advance, the balance until 15th September.
The deposit is non refundable 

I care about the energy of the group and   the recharge of each participant with this journey so there will be an interview before enrollment.

Write me : yogabymonicafilip@gmail.com

Join me in a journey that take place in your heart forever!

commerce/ accounting  coching classes

Show :- 8th Machma Expo 2022
An Exhibition on Machine Tools Automation & Engineering Technology
Date :- 9 | 10 | 11 | 12 | December 2022
Venue :- Grain Market Ground, Jalandhar Bye-Pass, Ludhiana.

Date of Event: 17th Dec 2022- 24th Dec 2022
Event Price: INR 46,999/-
Difficulty Level: Difficult


OVERVIEW
Bicycling is no more just an occasional ride to stay fit. Cycling tours in India serve as an efficient and fun way to explore different regions of the country. So, if you are a cycling enthusiast and want to make the most of it from the saddle of your cycle, congrats! You are at the right place.

In order to make this Odyssey more challenging and amusing, we tried to add exotic and scenic routes, from riding on flyovers to small lanes, Smooth & easy routes to gravel & Challenging roads, exploring plains to mountains regions, and much more. Get ready to witness the unique combination of heritage, metro life, and luxury in a single cycling expedition. This cycling expedition area is so diverse that there is something for everyone.

We will start this journey from the India Gate, Delhi, the capital city of India, then transverse through the pink city of India, Jaipur. Pedaling across the astonishing architectural buildings and the royalty of Rajasthan, then we will head towards Bundi, which is famous for its monuments and forts. After exploring Bundi, Our next destination will be Udaipur also known as the \City of Lakes\"
banner_url: which is famous for its ancient architectural places. After exploring the royalty of Rajasthan
score: we will move towards Godhra and then to Navsari which lies in Gujarat. Then
categories: we will head towards one of the most popular tourist states of India
column14: we will explore Vasai-Virar city. After exploring Vasai-Virar
column15: we will ride towards the final destination of this expedition
column17: which is also the capital city of Maharashtra.

event_id: Hotel Stay: 4 Star Hotel or Above
On this day you are supposed to report at 5:00 AM at INDIA GATE. Here
eventname: the bike check will be done. You will be introduced to the on-ground team that will be giving you hydration
start_time: technical and mechanical support during the entire event. Our Motorbike Marshals will make sure that each and every rider's journey is comfortable and glitch-free. Support Vehicles are available if a rider gets tired and wants some rest.

eventname: you will get breakfast after a 40 km ride from the start point. Today's lunch point is at King Highway Restaurant which is 150km away from our start point. Our first pit point will be 40 km from India Gate where you will get nutrition support. Then post 20 km breakfast boxes shall be provided to each participant to consume more carbs and proteins for energy to ride. Then after every 30 km
start_time: our nutrition support vehicle will be there to provide you with energy support.

event_id: The final destination for the day will be after 275 km; once you reach the destination
eventname: a welcome drink shall be served. Rooms will be allotted to each participant. You guys have rest
end_time: and then can re-gather for dinner. Post that
timezone: we shall leave for the sound and recovery sleep for the next day's ride.

event_id: Hotel Stay: 4 Star Hotel or Above
Brace yourself up as today we are going to cover 204km. While riding on the smooth National highway

About the event:
After journeying through various cities in India and handpicking relevant FinTech conversations for you in the form of 10 day-long Micro Experiences and Digital Edition of the mega event, FinTech Festival India is on the home stretch now!
FinTech Festival India is one big celebration of new ideas, technologies, conferences full of rich dialogues, productive engagements, and unlimited networking with the greatest minds from the world of Finance and Technology.
Join us for the FinTech Festival India Mega Event Physical Edition scheduled to take place in Pragati Maidan New Delhi from 20-22 July 2022.

FinTech Festival India is an event of Constellar.

Spantik Expedition 1st Augustst - 31st August 2022


Spantik was first climbed in 1955 by Karl Kramer’s German expedition. The most commonly climbed line follows the southeast ridge, which was attempted by the Bullock Workman party in 1906. The ridge rises 2700 meters over a lateral distance of 7.6 km, at angles which are mostly less than 30 degrees, with a few sections up to 40 degrees. It contains varied terrain, from rocky outcrops to snow and ice and scree.
The mountain is very popular with organized commercial expeditions, due to its relative ease of ascent and scarcity of objective dangers. The short 3day approach trek across straightforward terrain also provides for easy access and gradual acclimatization. This peak was scaled by the Aus-Pak expedition in July 2011 led by a team of mountaineers from Army High Altitude School Rattu. Lt Col Abdul Aziz was supervising the team of Climbers. The peak can be approached from Nagar Valley as well as from the Baltistan side. The First expedition was held in 1988, the team was composed of six Pakistan Army Personnel with German Team, the first Pakistani who reached the summit was Captain (now Brigadier) Muhammad Moiz Uddin Uppal, another expedition named the China-Pakistan Friendship Expedition scaled Spantik Peak.
Expedition leader Lt Col (retired) Dr. Abdul Jabbar Bhatti in a call from the summit said that the expedition members took turns to reach the summit between 1:45pm and 2:15pm on Sunday, July 15. Earlier, the summit team, which had started from Camp II (5, 600 meters) on July 14, set up Camp III (6,000 meters) the same day and pushed for the summit the following day. C III was established 300 meters lower than planned, which, combined with worst weather conditions and lack of visibility during the return from the summit, resulted in missing the route and forced the whole team to spend the night outside the camp, at the time when members were already exhausted. Digging out snow caves was the only option for protection from the extreme environment.



Departure/Return Location
Islamabad International Airport, Islamabad
Mountain Range: Karakoram
Elevation: 7027m
Best Time: Mid-May to End-August
Duration: 31 Days
Zone: Permitted


Day 01: Islamabad
Arrival in Islamabad and transfer to hotel. (only for foreigners)


Day 02: Islamabad to Skardu (By Air) (only for foreigners) Early morning flight to Skardu (flights are subject to weather), if unable to fly we will depart for Skardu by road with an overnight stay at Chilas. Overnight stay in a hotel at Skardu.


Day 03: Skardu
in case of flight has operated we will go for sightseeing tour of Skardu and in case no flight, the day will be used for overland travel from Chilas to Skardu. Overnight stay in a hotel at Skardu.


Day 04: Skardu to Arandu
After breakfast, we will embark jeeps for a full-day ride on a winding jeep trail to Arandu. The last inhabitance on our way to the Chogo lungma Glacier. (Tent)


Day 05: Arandu to Chogo Brangsa
After breakfast trek to Chogo Brangsa. Today we will leave the last inhabited village of Arandu. For the remaining portion of our journey, we will rely on our local team who will carry our food and equipment. The first day of trekking is quite short following the grassy valley on the northern side of the Chogo lungma Glacier. (Tent)


Day 06: Chogo Brangsa to Bolocho
After breakfast trek to Bolocho. A long day of trekking. We continue along the northern edge of the Chogo lungma Glacier, crossing two subsidiary glaciers to the Bolocho. (Tent)


Day 07 Bolucho to Spantik karavan base camp
After breakfast trek to Spantik Karavan base camp. Today we will cross Chogo Lungma Glacier. We gently gain height as we approach base camp at the foot of Spantik’s Southeast Ridge. (Tent)
Day 08: to 24: Climbing Activities
We have 15 days for acclimatization and for scaling the summit. (Tent)


Day 25: to 27: Return to Arandu
Trek back via the same route to Arandu. (Tent)


Day 28: Arandu to Skardu
After breakfast embark jeep drive to Skardu. Overnight stay in a hotel at Skardu.
Day 29: Skardu to Chilas
After breakfast and drive to Chilas. Overnight stay in a hotel at Chilas.


Day 30: Chilas to Islamabad
Early morning, we will depart for Islamabad, vis Babusar pass. Overnight stay in a hotel in Islamabad.


Day 31: Islamabad to Flight out
Transfer to airport for flight back home


Please Note: Gilgit Baltistan flights are subject to weather and backlog, in case of flight cancellation we will travel by road, and one night of Islamabad will be adjusted in overland travel.

TERMS & CONDITIONS:

Terms and conditions are strictly applied and need to be followed. We recommend you understand and agree with the conditions unconditionally to have a trip with us.
1. Participants are not allowed to be a part of any act showing
ethical or character failing for the period of the event.
2. Drugs usage or being involved and interaction with drug
dealers are strictly discouraged. Anybody found or caught
using any sort of drugs will be excluded from the journey
immediately on the spot and any kind of refund will not
be provided.
3. Payment policy: We recommend you reserve your place
as soon as the event is announced. You can secure your
place for the event by depositing 20% to 50% of the total
amount during the holidays. The deposit form and balance
payment need to be settled at least 7 days before your
arrival. For last-minute booking (Contract signed less than
10 days before arriving date), full payment is required upon
booking. In general, we will receive your payment in 5
working days, and you will receive an acknowledgment
right away.
4. Cancellation & Refunds: We feel sorry if you have decided
to call off your tour with us, though we understand that
most of the tourists do so out of necessity.
5. If you have to cancel your tour plan, please put forward
your cancellation application in _written form. Refunds will
be calculated as of the date we get your written
cancellation.
All payments for travel services not be returned to the
passenger. It shall be refunded in accordance with these
Terms and Conditions and in accordance with Sunrise
Adventure cancellation policy. In that event, we will repay
any payment made to Sunrise Adventure less any
cancellation fee that is applicable within 14 days of our
receipt of your written cancellation request.
6. Any appropriate refunds will be returned to you by Western
union or Wire transfer, and processed within 30 days of
acknowledgment of your cancellation.
7. The cancellation fee will be calculated as follows:
1. Table of Cancellation Charges Prior to departure
Charge 15 days or more
15% 0f land tour costs 7-14 days
30% of land tour costs 7 days – departure
50% of land tour costs No show-up

Join us on an exhilarating expedition into the heart of the remote and stunning Markha Valley in the Indian Himalaya!

Experience a truly stunning 11 day trek through the Ladakh mountain range which is full of rich cultural heritage to summit Kang Yatse 2 at 6250m.

Breese Adventures are offering a 11 day trek in the Ladakh region of the Indian Himalaya.

We will trek though the high mountain desert in northern India which is known for its stunning landscape, clear blue skies, ancient monasteries and its rich cultural heritage.

On this trek we pass through villages with irrigated fields against against a backdrop of stark, colourful rocky landscape with monasteries clinging high up in the cliffs. We will start our trip by way of the exciting flight into Leh which is at 3500m height, and then spend a couple of days taking it easy to aid acclimatisation, exploring some of the monasteries around the area.

After this initial acclimatisation period, we trek through the beautiful Markha valley visiting several settlements and monasteries before our summit attempt on Kang Yatse 2 at 6250m.

Our itinerary can be flexible and gives us the best chance of acclimatisation and lets us immerse ourselves in the history and the culture of this amazing region and we allow an extra day for our summit attempt.

We use only the best in country team and a Breese Adventures leader will also be on the trip.

For further information please visit our website page:-

https://www.breeseadventures.co.uk/events/kang-yatse-2/

description:
ಶ್ರೀ ಚಾಮುಂಡೇಶ್ವರಿ ಪೌರಾಣಿಕ ಹಿನ್ನಲೆಯುಳ್ಳ ದೇವತೆಯಾಗಿದ್ದು, 'ದೇವಿ ಮಹಾತ್ಮೆ' ಪುರಾಣದ ಪ್ರಮುಖ ದೇವತೆಯಾಗಿದ್ದಾಳೆ. ಪೌರಾಣಿಕ ಹಿನ್ನಲೆಯ ಈ ಶಕ್ತಿ ದೇವತೆ ಬೆಟ್ಟದ ಮೇಲೆ ವಾಸವಾಗಿದ್ದ ಮಹಿಷಾಸುರನನ್ನು ವಧಿಸಿದಳೆಂಬ ಕಥೆ 'ದೇವಿ ಮಹಾತ್ಮೆ' ಯಲ್ಲಿ ವರ್ಣಿತವಾಗಿದೆ. ಶ್ರೀ ಚಾಮುಂಡೇಶ್ವರಿಯಿಂದಲೇ ಈ ಬೆಟ್ಟಕ್ಕೆ ಚಾಮುಂಡಿಬೆಟ್ಟ ವೆಂಬ ಹೆಸರು ಬಂದಿದೆ. ಸ್ಕಂದ ಪುರಾಣ ಮತ್ತಿತರ ಪ್ರಾಚೀನ ಗ್ರಂಥಗಳು ಎಂಟು ಬೆಟ್ಟಗಳಿಂದ ಸುತ್ತುವರಿದ ತ್ರಿಮುಕುಟ ಕ್ಷೇತ್ರ ವೆಂಬ ಪವಿತ್ರ ಕ್ಷೇತ್ರವನ್ನು ಉಲ್ಲೇಖಿಸುತ್ತದೆ. ಆದರ ಪಶ್ಚಿಮ ಭಾಗದಲ್ಲಿರುವ ಚಾಮುಂಡಿಬೆಟ್ಟವು ಎಂಟು ಬೆಟ್ಟಗಳ ಪೈಕಿ ಒಂದಾಗಿದೆ. ಚಾಮುಂಡಿಬೆಟ್ಟದಲ್ಲಿರುವ ಶ್ರೀ ಮಹಾಬಲೇಶ್ವರ ದೇವಸ್ಥಾನವು ಅತ್ಯಂತ ಪ್ರಾಚೀನವಾದುದು. ಹಿಂದೆ ಬೆಟ್ಟವನ್ನು ಮಹಾಬಲಾದ್ರಿ ಎಂದೂ ಸಹ ಕರೆಯಲಾಗುತ್ತಿತ್ತು.
ಹಿಂದೆ ಚಿಕ್ಕದೊಂದು ದೇವಸ್ಥಾನವಿದ್ದು, ಕ್ರಮೇಣ ಅಭಿವೃದ್ಧಿ ಹೊಂದಿ, ಹೆಚ್ಚಿನ ಪ್ರಾಮುಖ್ಯತೆ ಗಳಿಸಿ, ಶ್ರೀ ಚಾಮುಂಡೇಶ್ವರಿ ದೇವಸ್ಥಾನವೆಂಬ ದೊಡ್ಡ ದೇವಸ್ಥಾನವಾಗಿ ಅಭಿವೃದ್ಧಿಯಾಗಿದೆ ಎಂದು ತಿಳಿದುಬರುತ್ತದೆ. 1799 ರಲ್ಲಿ ಅಧಿಕಾರಕ್ಕೆ ಬಂದ ಮೈಸೂರು ಅರಸರು ಈ ದೇವಿ ಅರಾಧಕರಾಗಿದ್ದು, ಶ್ರಧ್ದಾ ಭಕ್ತಿಯಿಂದ ದೇವಸ್ಥಾನವನ್ನು ಅಭಿವೃದ್ಧಿಪಡಿಸಿ ಅದನ್ನು ದೊಡ್ಡದಾದ ದೇವಾಲಯವನ್ನಾಗಿಸಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಹಾಗೂ ಹೆಚ್ಚಿನ ಮಹತ್ವ ತಂದಿದ್ದಾರೆ.
ಚಾಮುಂಡಿಬೆಟ್ಟ ಚಾರಿತ್ರಿಕ ಹಿನ್ನಲೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ಹೊಯ್ಸಳ, ವಿಜಯನಗರ ಹಾಗೂ ಮೈಸೂರು ಅರಸರ ಕೊಡುಗೆಯಿದೆ. 12ನೇ ಶತಮಾನದ ಹೊಯ್ಸಳ ದೊರೆ ವಿಷ್ಣುವರ್ಧನ ಹಾಗೂ 17ನೇ ಶತಮಾನದ ವಿಜಯನಗರದ ಅರಸರ ಹಿನ್ನಲೆಯನ್ನು ಗುರುತಿಸಲಾಗಿದೆ. ಕ್ರಿ.ಶ. 1573 ರಲ್ಲಿ ಚಾಮರಾಜ ಒಡೆಯರು ದೇವಿಯನ್ನು ಪೂಜಿಸಲು ಹೋಗುತ್ತಿದ್ದಾಗ ಅವರಿಗೆ ಸಿಡಿಲು ಬಡಿದು ಅವರ ತಲೆಯ ಕೂದಲೆಲ್ಲಾ ಉದುರಿ ಹೋದವೆಂದು ಇತಿಹಾಸ ಹೇಳುತ್ತದೆ.
ಶ್ರೀ ಚಾಮುಂಡೇಶ್ವರಿ ದೇವಸ್ಥಾನ ಚೌಕಾಕೃತಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ನಿರ್ಮಾಣವಾಗಿದೆ. ದ್ರಾವಿಡ ಶೈಲಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ಕಟ್ಟಲಾಗಿರುವ ದೇವಸ್ಥಾನ, ಹೆಬ್ಬಾಗಿಲು, ಪ್ರವೇಶ ದ್ವಾರ, ನವರಂಗ, ಅಂತರಾಳ, ಗರ್ಭಗೃಹ, ಮತ್ತು ಪ್ರಾಕಾರಗಳನ್ನು ಹೊಂದಿದೆ. ಮಹಾದ್ವಾರದ ಮೇಲೆ ಸುಂದರವಾದ `ಗೋಪುರ` ಮತ್ತು ಗರ್ಭಗುಡಿಯ ಮೇಲೆ 'ವಿಮಾನ' ಶಿಖರಗಳಿವೆ. ಏಳು ಅಂತಸ್ತುಗಳ ಗೋಪುರ 19ನೇ ಶತಮಾನದಲ್ಲಿ ನಿರ್ಮಿತವಾಗಿದ್ದು ಪಿರಮಿಡ್ ಆಕಾರದಲ್ಲಿ ದ್ರಾವಿಡ ಶೈಲಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ನಿರ್ಮಿತವಾಗಿದೆ. ಶಿಖರದ ಮೇಲೆ ಏಳು ಚಿನ್ನದ ಲೇಪಿತ ಕಲಶಗಳಿವೆ.
ಗರ್ಭಗುಡಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ಮಹಿಷಮರ್ಧಿನಿಯಾದ ಚಾಮುಂಡೇಶ್ವರಿಯ ವಿಗ್ರಹವು ವಿರಾಜಮಾನವಾಗಿದೆ. ಎಂಟು ಭುಜಗಳನ್ನು ಹೊಂದಿರುವ ಚಾಮುಂಡೇಶ್ವರಿ ಇಲ್ಲಿ ಆಸೀನಳಾಗಿದ್ದಾಳೆ. ಈ ವಿಗ್ರಹವು ಬಹಳಷ್ಟು ಪುರಾತನವಾದದ್ದು. ಈ ಶಿಲಾಮೂರ್ತಿಯನ್ನು ಮಾರ್ಖಂಡೇಯ ಋಷಿಗಳು ಸ್ಥಾಪಿಸಿದರೆಂದು ಸ್ಥಳ ಪುರಾಣ ಹೇಳುತ್ತದೆ. 1827 ರಲ್ಲಿ ಮುಮ್ಮಡಿ ಕೃಷ್ಣರಾಜಒಡೆಯರು ಸಾವಿರ ವರ್ಷಕ್ಕೂ ಹಿಂದಿನ ಹಿನ್ನಲೆಯಿರುವ ದೇವಸ್ಥಾನದ ಜೀರ್ಣೋಧ್ದಾರ ಮಾಡಿ ಮಹಾದ್ವಾರದ ಮೇಲೆ ಈ ದೊಡ್ಡ ಗೋಪುರವನ್ನು ಕಟ್ಟಿಸಿದರು. 'ಸಿಂಹವಾಹನ' ಒಂದನ್ನು ಮರದಲ್ಲಿ ನಿರ್ಮಿಸಿ ಕೊಡುಗೆ ನೀಡಿದರು. 'ಸಿಂಹ ವಾಹನ' ವನ್ನು ರಥೋತ್ಸವ ಸಂಧರ್ಭದಲ್ಲಿ ಬಳಸಲಾಗುತ್ತಿದ್ದು ಅದರಲ್ಲಿ ದೇವಿಯ ಉತ್ಸವ ಮೂರ್ತಿಯನ್ನಿಟ್ಟು ರಥವನ್ನು ಎಳೆಯಲಾಗುತ್ತದೆ. ದ್ವಾರದ ಮೇಲ್ಭಾಗದಲ್ಲಿ ಸಣ್ಣದೊಂದು ಗಣಪತಿಯ ವಿಗ್ರಹವನ್ನು ನೋಡಬಹುದು. ದ್ವಾರದ ಬೃಹತ್ ಮರದ ಬಾಗಿಲನ್ನು ಬೆಳ್ಳಿಯ ತಗಡಿನಿಂದ ಹೊದಿಸಲಾಗಿದ್ದು, ಬೆಳ್ಳಿಯ ಬಾಗಿಲಿನ ಮೇಲೆ ದೇವಿಯ ಹಲವು ಸ್ವರೂಪಗಳನ್ನು ತೋರಲಾಗಿದೆ. ಮಹಾದ್ವಾರದ ಕೆಳ ಪಾರ್ಶ್ವದಲ್ಲಿ ಇಂದ್ರಾದಿ ಅಷ್ಠದಿಕ್ಪಾಲಕರ ವಿಗ್ರಹಗಳಿವೆ.
ಮಹಾದ್ವಾರದಿಂದ ಒಳಗೆ ಹೋದರೆ ಬಲಭಾಗದಲ್ಲಿ ದಕ್ಷಿಣಾಭಿಮುಖವಾಗಿ ಗಣಪತಿಯ ಸಣ್ಣ ವಿಗ್ರಹವು ಸ್ಥಾಪಿಸಲ್ಪಟ್ಟಿದೆ. ವಿಘ್ನರಾಜನಿಗೆ ನಮಿಸಿ ಕೆಲವು ಕಲ್ಲಿನ ಮೆಟ್ಟಿಲುಗಳನ್ನು ಹತ್ತಿಹೋದರೆ ದೇವಸ್ಥಾನದ ಬಲಿಪೀಠ ಮತ್ತು ಧ್ವಜ ಸ್ಥಂಭ ಕಂಡುಬರುತ್ತದೆ. ಬಲಿಪೀಠದ ಮೇಲೆ ದೇವಿಯ ಪಾದಗಳನ್ನು ರೂಪಿಸಲಾಗಿದೆ. ಇವೆರಡರ ಮುಂಭಾಗದಲ್ಲಿ ಗರ್ಭಗುಡಿಗೆ ಅಭಿಮುಖವಾಗಿ ಸಣ್ಣದೊಂದು ನಂದಿ ವಿಗ್ರಹವಿದೆ. ಮಾತೆ ಚಾಮುಂಡಿಯನ್ನು ಅದು ವೀಕ್ಷಿಸುತ್ತಾ ಕುಳಿತಿದೆ. ಧ್ವಜ ಸ್ಥಂಭಕ್ಕೆ ಈಶಾನ್ಯದಲ್ಲಿ ಗೋಡೆಯ ಮೇಲೆ ಆಂಜನೇಯನ ವಿಗ್ರಹವಿದ್ದು ಅದಕ್ಕೂ ನಿತ್ಯ ಪೂಜೆ ಜರುಗುತ್ತದೆ. ಇಲ್ಲಿನ ಪ್ರವೇಶ ದ್ವಾರದಲ್ಲಿ ನಂದಿನಿ ಮತ್ತು ಕಮಲಿನಿ ಎಂಬ ದ್ವಾರಪಾಲಿಕೆಯರ ವಿಗ್ರಹಗಳು ದ್ವಾರದ ಎಡ ಮತ್ತು ಬಲ ಭಾಗದಲ್ಲಿವೆ.
ಗರ್ಭಗುಡಿಗೆ ಮುಂಚೆ ಇರುವ ಅತರಾಳದ ಎಡಭಾಗದಲ್ಲಿ ಮುದ್ದಾದ ಗಣಪಡತಿ ವಿಗ್ರಹ ಮತ್ತು ಬಲಭಾಗದಲ್ಲಿ ಭೈರವ ದೇವರ ವಿಗ್ರಹಗಳಿವೆ. ಭೈರವ ದೇವರ ಎಡಭಾಗದಲ್ಲಿ ಚಾಮುಂಡಿಯ ಪಂಚಲೋಹದ ಸುಂದರ ಉತ್ಸವ ಮೂರ್ತಿಯಿದೆ. ಗಣಪತಿಯ ಬಲಭಾಗದಲ್ಲಿ ಭಕ್ತನ ದಿರಿಸು ತೊಟ್ಟಿರುವ ಮುಮ್ಮಡಿ ಕೃಷ್ಣರಾಜ ಒಡೆಯರ ಆರು ಅಡಿ ಎತ್ತರದ ಸುಂದರ ಭಕ್ತ ವಿಗ್ರಹ ಕಾಣಬರುತ್ತದೆ. ಮಹಾರಾಜರು ತಮ್ಮ ಮೂವರು ಪತ್ನಿಯರೊಂದಿಗೆ ದೇವಿಗೆ ಕೈಮುಗಿದು ನಿಂತಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಮಹಾರಾಜರ ಎಡಭಾಗಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ನಿಂತಿರುವವರೆಂದರೆ ರಮಾವಿಲಾಸ, ಲಕ್ಷ್ಮಿವಿಲಾಸ ಮತ್ತು ಕೃಷ್ಣವಿಲಾಸ ಮಹಾರಾಣಿಯರು. ಇವರುಗಳ ಶಿಲಾ ವಿಗ್ರಹಗಳ ಪಾದದ ಬಳಿಯ ಪೀಠದ ಮೇಲೆ ಇವರುಗಳ ಹೆಸರುಗಳನ್ನು ಕೆತ್ತಲಾಗಿದೆ.
ದೇವಾಲಯದ ಅರ್ಚಕರು ತಾಯಿ ಸ್ವರೂಪದ ಶಿಲಾ ಪ್ರತಿಮೆಯನ್ನು ಪ್ರತಿ ದಿನ ಅಲಂಕರಿಸಿ ಪೂಜೆ ಮಾಡುತ್ತಾರೆ. ಯದುಕುಲದ ದೇವತೆಯಾಗಿ ಬೆಳೆದು ಬಂದಿರುವ ಶ್ರೀ ಚಾಮುಂಡೇಶ್ವರಿಗೆ ಮೈಸೂರಿನ ಮಹಾರಾಜರುಗಳು ಹಲವಾರು ಬೆಲೆಬಾಳುವ ಹಾಗೂ ಅಪರೂಪವಾದ ಕಾಣಿಕೆಗಳನ್ನು ಶ್ರಧ್ಧಾಭಕ್ತಿಯಿಂದ ಒಪ್ಪಿಸಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಈ ಶಕ್ತಿ ದೇವತೆಗೆ ಮಾನವ ಮತ್ತು ಪ್ರಾಣಿ ಬಲಿಯನ್ನು ಹಿಂದೆ ಕೊಡಲಾಗುತ್ತಿತ್ತು. ಆದರೆ 18ನೇ ಶತಮಾನದಲ್ಲಿ ಅದಕ್ಕೆ ಕಡಿವಾಣ ಬಿತ್ತು. ಈಗೇನಿದ್ದರೂ ಫಲಪುಷ್ಪಗಳ ಅರ್ಚನೆ, ಹಣ್ಣು ಹೂವು ಸಮರ್ಪಣೆ ಮಾತ್ರ ಮಾಡಲಾಗುತ್ತದೆ.
ಗರ್ಭಗುಡಿಯ ಮೇಲ್ಭಾಗದಲ್ಲಿ ಇನ್ನೊಂದು ಸಣ್ಣ ಗೋಪುರ ಕಂಡು ಬರುತ್ತದೆ. ದೇವಾಲಯದ ಹೊರಗಿನಿಂದ 'ವಿಮಾನವನ್ನು' ಕಾಣಬಹುದು. ಒಳ ಪಾರ್ಶ್ವದಲ್ಲಿರುವ ಪ್ರಾಕಾರದಲ್ಲಿ ಹಲವು ಸಣ್ಣ ಮೂರ್ತಿಗಳಿದ್ದು ಅಲ್ಲಿಯೂ ಪೂಜೆ ಪುನಸ್ಕಾರಗಳು ಜರುಗುತ್ತವೆ. ಪ್ರಾಕಾರದಲ್ಲಿ ಪ್ರದಕ್ಷಿಣೆ ಮುಗಿಸಿ ದೇವಸ್ಥಾನದಿಂದ ಹೊರಹೋಗುವಾಗ ಶ್ರೀ ಆಂಜನೇಯಸ್ವಾಮಿ ದೇವರ ದರ್ಶನವನ್ನು ಮಾಡಬಹುದಾಗಿದೆ.

eventname: ಶ್ರೀ ಚಾಮುಂಡೇಶ್ವರಿ ದೇವಿ, ಮೈಸೂರು ನಾಲ್ಕನೇ ಆಷಾಢ ಶುಕ್ರವಾರ
description:
ಶ್ರೀ ಚಾಮುಂಡೇಶ್ವರಿ ಪೌರಾಣಿಕ ಹಿನ್ನಲೆಯುಳ್ಳ ದೇವತೆಯಾಗಿದ್ದು, 'ದೇವಿ ಮಹಾತ್ಮೆ' ಪುರಾಣದ ಪ್ರಮುಖ ದೇವತೆಯಾಗಿದ್ದಾಳೆ. ಪೌರಾಣಿಕ ಹಿನ್ನಲೆಯ ಈ ಶಕ್ತಿ ದೇವತೆ ಬೆಟ್ಟದ ಮೇಲೆ ವಾಸವಾಗಿದ್ದ ಮಹಿಷಾಸುರನನ್ನು ವಧಿಸಿದಳೆಂಬ ಕಥೆ 'ದೇವಿ ಮಹಾತ್ಮೆ' ಯಲ್ಲಿ ವರ್ಣಿತವಾಗಿದೆ. ಶ್ರೀ ಚಾಮುಂಡೇಶ್ವರಿಯಿಂದಲೇ ಈ ಬೆಟ್ಟಕ್ಕೆ ಚಾಮುಂಡಿಬೆಟ್ಟ ವೆಂಬ ಹೆಸರು ಬಂದಿದೆ. ಸ್ಕಂದ ಪುರಾಣ ಮತ್ತಿತರ ಪ್ರಾಚೀನ ಗ್ರಂಥಗಳು ಎಂಟು ಬೆಟ್ಟಗಳಿಂದ ಸುತ್ತುವರಿದ ತ್ರಿಮುಕುಟ ಕ್ಷೇತ್ರ ವೆಂಬ ಪವಿತ್ರ ಕ್ಷೇತ್ರವನ್ನು ಉಲ್ಲೇಖಿಸುತ್ತದೆ. ಆದರ ಪಶ್ಚಿಮ ಭಾಗದಲ್ಲಿರುವ ಚಾಮುಂಡಿಬೆಟ್ಟವು ಎಂಟು ಬೆಟ್ಟಗಳ ಪೈಕಿ ಒಂದಾಗಿದೆ. ಚಾಮುಂಡಿಬೆಟ್ಟದಲ್ಲಿರುವ ಶ್ರೀ ಮಹಾಬಲೇಶ್ವರ ದೇವಸ್ಥಾನವು ಅತ್ಯಂತ ಪ್ರಾಚೀನವಾದುದು. ಹಿಂದೆ ಬೆಟ್ಟವನ್ನು ಮಹಾಬಲಾದ್ರಿ ಎಂದೂ ಸಹ ಕರೆಯಲಾಗುತ್ತಿತ್ತು.
ಹಿಂದೆ ಚಿಕ್ಕದೊಂದು ದೇವಸ್ಥಾನವಿದ್ದು, ಕ್ರಮೇಣ ಅಭಿವೃದ್ಧಿ ಹೊಂದಿ, ಹೆಚ್ಚಿನ ಪ್ರಾಮುಖ್ಯತೆ ಗಳಿಸಿ, ಶ್ರೀ ಚಾಮುಂಡೇಶ್ವರಿ ದೇವಸ್ಥಾನವೆಂಬ ದೊಡ್ಡ ದೇವಸ್ಥಾನವಾಗಿ ಅಭಿವೃದ್ಧಿಯಾಗಿದೆ ಎಂದು ತಿಳಿದುಬರುತ್ತದೆ. 1799 ರಲ್ಲಿ ಅಧಿಕಾರಕ್ಕೆ ಬಂದ ಮೈಸೂರು ಅರಸರು ಈ ದೇವಿ ಅರಾಧಕರಾಗಿದ್ದು, ಶ್ರಧ್ದಾ ಭಕ್ತಿಯಿಂದ ದೇವಸ್ಥಾನವನ್ನು ಅಭಿವೃದ್ಧಿಪಡಿಸಿ ಅದನ್ನು ದೊಡ್ಡದಾದ ದೇವಾಲಯವನ್ನಾಗಿಸಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಹಾಗೂ ಹೆಚ್ಚಿನ ಮಹತ್ವ ತಂದಿದ್ದಾರೆ.
ಚಾಮುಂಡಿಬೆಟ್ಟ ಚಾರಿತ್ರಿಕ ಹಿನ್ನಲೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ಹೊಯ್ಸಳ, ವಿಜಯನಗರ ಹಾಗೂ ಮೈಸೂರು ಅರಸರ ಕೊಡುಗೆಯಿದೆ. 12ನೇ ಶತಮಾನದ ಹೊಯ್ಸಳ ದೊರೆ ವಿಷ್ಣುವರ್ಧನ ಹಾಗೂ 17ನೇ ಶತಮಾನದ ವಿಜಯನಗರದ ಅರಸರ ಹಿನ್ನಲೆಯನ್ನು ಗುರುತಿಸಲಾಗಿದೆ. ಕ್ರಿ.ಶ. 1573 ರಲ್ಲಿ ಚಾಮರಾಜ ಒಡೆಯರು ದೇವಿಯನ್ನು ಪೂಜಿಸಲು ಹೋಗುತ್ತಿದ್ದಾಗ ಅವರಿಗೆ ಸಿಡಿಲು ಬಡಿದು ಅವರ ತಲೆಯ ಕೂದಲೆಲ್ಲಾ ಉದುರಿ ಹೋದವೆಂದು ಇತಿಹಾಸ ಹೇಳುತ್ತದೆ.
ಶ್ರೀ ಚಾಮುಂಡೇಶ್ವರಿ ದೇವಸ್ಥಾನ ಚೌಕಾಕೃತಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ನಿರ್ಮಾಣವಾಗಿದೆ. ದ್ರಾವಿಡ ಶೈಲಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ಕಟ್ಟಲಾಗಿರುವ ದೇವಸ್ಥಾನ, ಹೆಬ್ಬಾಗಿಲು, ಪ್ರವೇಶ ದ್ವಾರ, ನವರಂಗ, ಅಂತರಾಳ, ಗರ್ಭಗೃಹ, ಮತ್ತು ಪ್ರಾಕಾರಗಳನ್ನು ಹೊಂದಿದೆ. ಮಹಾದ್ವಾರದ ಮೇಲೆ ಸುಂದರವಾದ `ಗೋಪುರ` ಮತ್ತು ಗರ್ಭಗುಡಿಯ ಮೇಲೆ 'ವಿಮಾನ' ಶಿಖರಗಳಿವೆ. ಏಳು ಅಂತಸ್ತುಗಳ ಗೋಪುರ 19ನೇ ಶತಮಾನದಲ್ಲಿ ನಿರ್ಮಿತವಾಗಿದ್ದು ಪಿರಮಿಡ್ ಆಕಾರದಲ್ಲಿ ದ್ರಾವಿಡ ಶೈಲಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ನಿರ್ಮಿತವಾಗಿದೆ. ಶಿಖರದ ಮೇಲೆ ಏಳು ಚಿನ್ನದ ಲೇಪಿತ ಕಲಶಗಳಿವೆ.
ಗರ್ಭಗುಡಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ಮಹಿಷಮರ್ಧಿನಿಯಾದ ಚಾಮುಂಡೇಶ್ವರಿಯ ವಿಗ್ರಹವು ವಿರಾಜಮಾನವಾಗಿದೆ. ಎಂಟು ಭುಜಗಳನ್ನು ಹೊಂದಿರುವ ಚಾಮುಂಡೇಶ್ವರಿ ಇಲ್ಲಿ ಆಸೀನಳಾಗಿದ್ದಾಳೆ. ಈ ವಿಗ್ರಹವು ಬಹಳಷ್ಟು ಪುರಾತನವಾದದ್ದು. ಈ ಶಿಲಾಮೂರ್ತಿಯನ್ನು ಮಾರ್ಖಂಡೇಯ ಋಷಿಗಳು ಸ್ಥಾಪಿಸಿದರೆಂದು ಸ್ಥಳ ಪುರಾಣ ಹೇಳುತ್ತದೆ. 1827 ರಲ್ಲಿ ಮುಮ್ಮಡಿ ಕೃಷ್ಣರಾಜಒಡೆಯರು ಸಾವಿರ ವರ್ಷಕ್ಕೂ ಹಿಂದಿನ ಹಿನ್ನಲೆಯಿರುವ ದೇವಸ್ಥಾನದ ಜೀರ್ಣೋಧ್ದಾರ ಮಾಡಿ ಮಹಾದ್ವಾರದ ಮೇಲೆ ಈ ದೊಡ್ಡ ಗೋಪುರವನ್ನು ಕಟ್ಟಿಸಿದರು. 'ಸಿಂಹವಾಹನ' ಒಂದನ್ನು ಮರದಲ್ಲಿ ನಿರ್ಮಿಸಿ ಕೊಡುಗೆ ನೀಡಿದರು. 'ಸಿಂಹ ವಾಹನ' ವನ್ನು ರಥೋತ್ಸವ ಸಂಧರ್ಭದಲ್ಲಿ ಬಳಸಲಾಗುತ್ತಿದ್ದು ಅದರಲ್ಲಿ ದೇವಿಯ ಉತ್ಸವ ಮೂರ್ತಿಯನ್ನಿಟ್ಟು ರಥವನ್ನು ಎಳೆಯಲಾಗುತ್ತದೆ. ದ್ವಾರದ ಮೇಲ್ಭಾಗದಲ್ಲಿ ಸಣ್ಣದೊಂದು ಗಣಪತಿಯ ವಿಗ್ರಹವನ್ನು ನೋಡಬಹುದು. ದ್ವಾರದ ಬೃಹತ್ ಮರದ ಬಾಗಿಲನ್ನು ಬೆಳ್ಳಿಯ ತಗಡಿನಿಂದ ಹೊದಿಸಲಾಗಿದ್ದು, ಬೆಳ್ಳಿಯ ಬಾಗಿಲಿನ ಮೇಲೆ ದೇವಿಯ ಹಲವು ಸ್ವರೂಪಗಳನ್ನು ತೋರಲಾಗಿದೆ. ಮಹಾದ್ವಾರದ ಕೆಳ ಪಾರ್ಶ್ವದಲ್ಲಿ ಇಂದ್ರಾದಿ ಅಷ್ಠದಿಕ್ಪಾಲಕರ ವಿಗ್ರಹಗಳಿವೆ.
ಮಹಾದ್ವಾರದಿಂದ ಒಳಗೆ ಹೋದರೆ ಬಲಭಾಗದಲ್ಲಿ ದಕ್ಷಿಣಾಭಿಮುಖವಾಗಿ ಗಣಪತಿಯ ಸಣ್ಣ ವಿಗ್ರಹವು ಸ್ಥಾಪಿಸಲ್ಪಟ್ಟಿದೆ. ವಿಘ್ನರಾಜನಿಗೆ ನಮಿಸಿ ಕೆಲವು ಕಲ್ಲಿನ ಮೆಟ್ಟಿಲುಗಳನ್ನು ಹತ್ತಿಹೋದರೆ ದೇವಸ್ಥಾನದ ಬಲಿಪೀಠ ಮತ್ತು ಧ್ವಜ ಸ್ಥಂಭ ಕಂಡುಬರುತ್ತದೆ. ಬಲಿಪೀಠದ ಮೇಲೆ ದೇವಿಯ ಪಾದಗಳನ್ನು ರೂಪಿಸಲಾಗಿದೆ. ಇವೆರಡರ ಮುಂಭಾಗದಲ್ಲಿ ಗರ್ಭಗುಡಿಗೆ ಅಭಿಮುಖವಾಗಿ ಸಣ್ಣದೊಂದು ನಂದಿ ವಿಗ್ರಹವಿದೆ. ಮಾತೆ ಚಾಮುಂಡಿಯನ್ನು ಅದು ವೀಕ್ಷಿಸುತ್ತಾ ಕುಳಿತಿದೆ. ಧ್ವಜ ಸ್ಥಂಭಕ್ಕೆ ಈಶಾನ್ಯದಲ್ಲಿ ಗೋಡೆಯ ಮೇಲೆ ಆಂಜನೇಯನ ವಿಗ್ರಹವಿದ್ದು ಅದಕ್ಕೂ ನಿತ್ಯ ಪೂಜೆ ಜರುಗುತ್ತದೆ. ಇಲ್ಲಿನ ಪ್ರವೇಶ ದ್ವಾರದಲ್ಲಿ ನಂದಿನಿ ಮತ್ತು ಕಮಲಿನಿ ಎಂಬ ದ್ವಾರಪಾಲಿಕೆಯರ ವಿಗ್ರಹಗಳು ದ್ವಾರದ ಎಡ ಮತ್ತು ಬಲ ಭಾಗದಲ್ಲಿವೆ.
ಗರ್ಭಗುಡಿಗೆ ಮುಂಚೆ ಇರುವ ಅತರಾಳದ ಎಡಭಾಗದಲ್ಲಿ ಮುದ್ದಾದ ಗಣಪಡತಿ ವಿಗ್ರಹ ಮತ್ತು ಬಲಭಾಗದಲ್ಲಿ ಭೈರವ ದೇವರ ವಿಗ್ರಹಗಳಿವೆ. ಭೈರವ ದೇವರ ಎಡಭಾಗದಲ್ಲಿ ಚಾಮುಂಡಿಯ ಪಂಚಲೋಹದ ಸುಂದರ ಉತ್ಸವ ಮೂರ್ತಿಯಿದೆ. ಗಣಪತಿಯ ಬಲಭಾಗದಲ್ಲಿ ಭಕ್ತನ ದಿರಿಸು ತೊಟ್ಟಿರುವ ಮುಮ್ಮಡಿ ಕೃಷ್ಣರಾಜ ಒಡೆಯರ ಆರು ಅಡಿ ಎತ್ತರದ ಸುಂದರ ಭಕ್ತ ವಿಗ್ರಹ ಕಾಣಬರುತ್ತದೆ. ಮಹಾರಾಜರು ತಮ್ಮ ಮೂವರು ಪತ್ನಿಯರೊಂದಿಗೆ ದೇವಿಗೆ ಕೈಮುಗಿದು ನಿಂತಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಮಹಾರಾಜರ ಎಡಭಾಗಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ನಿಂತಿರುವವರೆಂದರೆ ರಮಾವಿಲಾಸ, ಲಕ್ಷ್ಮಿವಿಲಾಸ ಮತ್ತು ಕೃಷ್ಣವಿಲಾಸ ಮಹಾರಾಣಿಯರು. ಇವರುಗಳ ಶಿಲಾ ವಿಗ್ರಹಗಳ ಪಾದದ ಬಳಿಯ ಪೀಠದ ಮೇಲೆ ಇವರುಗಳ ಹೆಸರುಗಳನ್ನು ಕೆತ್ತಲಾಗಿದೆ.
ದೇವಾಲಯದ ಅರ್ಚಕರು ತಾಯಿ ಸ್ವರೂಪದ ಶಿಲಾ ಪ್ರತಿಮೆಯನ್ನು ಪ್ರತಿ ದಿನ ಅಲಂಕರಿಸಿ ಪೂಜೆ ಮಾಡುತ್ತಾರೆ. ಯದುಕುಲದ ದೇವತೆಯಾಗಿ ಬೆಳೆದು ಬಂದಿರುವ ಶ್ರೀ ಚಾಮುಂಡೇಶ್ವರಿಗೆ ಮೈಸೂರಿನ ಮಹಾರಾಜರುಗಳು ಹಲವಾರು ಬೆಲೆಬಾಳುವ ಹಾಗೂ ಅಪರೂಪವಾದ ಕಾಣಿಕೆಗಳನ್ನು ಶ್ರಧ್ಧಾಭಕ್ತಿಯಿಂದ ಒಪ್ಪಿಸಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಈ ಶಕ್ತಿ ದೇವತೆಗೆ ಮಾನವ ಮತ್ತು ಪ್ರಾಣಿ ಬಲಿಯನ್ನು ಹಿಂದೆ ಕೊಡಲಾಗುತ್ತಿತ್ತು. ಆದರೆ 18ನೇ ಶತಮಾನದಲ್ಲಿ ಅದಕ್ಕೆ ಕಡಿವಾಣ ಬಿತ್ತು. ಈಗೇನಿದ್ದರೂ ಫಲಪುಷ್ಪಗಳ ಅರ್ಚನೆ, ಹಣ್ಣು ಹೂವು ಸಮರ್ಪಣೆ ಮಾತ್ರ ಮಾಡಲಾಗುತ್ತದೆ.
ಗರ್ಭಗುಡಿಯ ಮೇಲ್ಭಾಗದಲ್ಲಿ ಇನ್ನೊಂದು ಸಣ್ಣ ಗೋಪುರ ಕಂಡು ಬರುತ್ತದೆ. ದೇವಾಲಯದ ಹೊರಗಿನಿಂದ 'ವಿಮಾನವನ್ನು' ಕಾಣಬಹುದು. ಒಳ ಪಾರ್ಶ್ವದಲ್ಲಿರುವ ಪ್ರಾಕಾರದಲ್ಲಿ ಹಲವು ಸಣ್ಣ ಮೂರ್ತಿಗಳಿದ್ದು ಅಲ್ಲಿಯೂ ಪೂಜೆ ಪುನಸ್ಕಾರಗಳು ಜರುಗುತ್ತವೆ. ಪ್ರಾಕಾರದಲ್ಲಿ ಪ್ರದಕ್ಷಿಣೆ ಮುಗಿಸಿ ದೇವಸ್ಥಾನದಿಂದ ಹೊರಹೋಗುವಾಗ ಶ್ರೀ ಆಂಜನೇಯಸ್ವಾಮಿ ದೇವರ ದರ್ಶನವನ್ನು ಮಾಡಬಹುದಾಗಿದೆ.

eventname: Fashionista Fashion and Lifestyle Exhibition Ahmedabad
description:
After the superhit Inaugural show FASHIONISTA is back in Ahmedabad with its glorious & exclusive designers presenting ensembles, bespoke jewelry, footwear, accessories, and many more.

BLOCK YOUR DATES - 4 - 5 July 2022
VENUE- The Grand Bhagwati
TIMINGS- 11am to 8pm

We invite you to BOOK your STALL NOW before all gets SOLD OUT 
For Bookings:
Contact: 9619780581/ 9619780555/ 9820175842/ 9930734181

Visit: www.fashionistaindia.com
FREE ENTRY for VISITORS

Golden Triangle with Haridwar & Rishikesh 

Duration: 10 nights/ 11 days   Oct 20-30 2022 

Places covered: New Delhi- Jaipur - Agra - Haridwar - Rishikesh - Delhi 

Overview: One of the most popular tour packages for India is a visit to cities falling in the Golden Triangle. And adding Rishikesh & Haridwar with this tour will offers you a visual bliss and tranquility in these two “Lands of Sages”. An opportunity to explore the popular cities of Delhi, Agra and Jaipur along with the Rishikesh & Haridwar. During your visit, you will experience something different in each city. Delhi will offer a potpourri of everything, Agra will take you back in the Mughal times, Jaipur will offer you a sneakpeak into the erstwhile Rajputana royalty. Haridwar, The Gateway To The Gods and Rishikesh the town of Sages and Yoga Capital of the World.

 Highlights: • Food walk in Old Delhi • Visit of magnificent Taj Mahal • In evening attend aarti or a prayer ceremony at Birla Mandir • Some offbeat treks in Rishikesh • Ganga aarti at Parmarth Niketan Ashram, Rishikesh • Evening attend Ganga aarti ceremony on Ghat called Har Ki Pauri in Haridwar
 Feed & Ride Elephants, tour amazing gardens, Gangi ceremonies, so much to see and do!

This is an amazing opportunity to be guided to the spiritual and historical aspects of one of the most beautifully energetic lands of this world! We will be there for the beautiful celebration of Diwali - Festival of Lights!

Travel is very safe, personally and health-wise, all 5 star hotels, private transportation and native guide. This trip can transform your life!
$2600 Twin Room (plus airfare) 
two Persons per room)
$3160 plus airfare (Single)

(includes gratuities, all meals, hotels, private transportation, entry fees to historical sites and more)

For additional information or to register: 302-530-6682

eventname: Kashmir Great Lakes Trek - Nature's Lover Paradise
description:
Kashmir Great Lakes Trek - Nature's Lover Paradise
Event Dates :- 
29 August To 05 September 2022 (Batch-2) - 8D/7N
Cost : INR 14000/Person (Srinagar To Srinagar)
Contact : 9686633699 / 7975053556
Registration Link : http://bit.ly/Kashmirgreatlakestrek

*Overview*
===========
The main highlights of the tour are the alpine lakes situated in the creeks of the Kashmir Valley. Altogether this tour gives us a close view of this undaunted paradise. The Kashmir great lakes trek is indeed a treat for the eyes. Kashmir Great Lakes trek is a trekking expedition of 70-72 km which commences from Sonamarg, reaches the highest point, Gadsar Pass at 13,750 feet and concludes at Naranag at 7450 feet. The trek is full of extensive mountain walking with some steep climbs and sharp descends. As the name indicates the Great Lakes trek comprises of a trekking expedition amidst some of the major lakes of Kashmir, which includes Gadsar, Vishansar, Kishansar, Nundkol, Gangabal and so on. Pristine and untouched, the lakes over here be it Dal Lake, Vishansar Lake or Gangabal Twin lakes are surreal and a rare sight. Alpine and snow-clad mountains, green meadows, rocky terrains, gurgling streams, silver birch and other untouched beauties of Mother Earth make for a varied and complete trekking experience of around 70-72 km these days, rediscover serenity and uncover what makes Kashmir Great Lakes Trek a trove for adventure and nature enthusiasts seeking a thrilling experience of trekking in India.

=============
*What you expect from this Trek*
=> Nature'sLoverParadise
=> Mighty Snow Mountains
=> Mighty Landscapes
=> Mighty View Points
=> Highest Valley of Passes
=> Chilling Cold
=> Crystal Clear Lakes.
=> Picturesque views

Trek Details 
===========
Difficulty: Moderate.
Max Altitude: 13750 ft.
Distance: Approx.68 - 75 km
Base Camp: Sonmarg.
Duration: 8 Days 7 nights.
Best Season: June 20 - Sep 15
Daytime temperature: 17°C - 20°C
Night-time temperature: 3°C - 4°C


*Itinerary* 
================
August 10 & August 28 (Day 0) : Get Flight from Bangalore to Shrinagar. And stay at Shrinagar. (Flight details will share you)

Aug 11 & Aug 29 (Day 1) : Srinagar to Sonamarg (Altitude: 8000 ft)
Getting to base camp - Sonamarg. Depart to Sonamarg in the afternoon. It is a 4 hrs drive from Srinagar.

Aug 12 & Aug 30 (Day 2) : Sonamarg to Nichnai (11,500ft) via Shekdur – 11km Trek (7/8hrs)
Your trek starts with steep climbs and continues along a well-defined uphill path to Nichnai. You will explore the dense forests of the valley along with the beautiful landscapes of the Sonamarg valley. After 3km of steep ascend you will find a small Dhaba where they sell water bottles, biscuits and more basic eatables, this will be your last point to buy eatables, after this point, next civilization point will be Naranag on the last day of the trek. The river valley is the beginning of Nichanai. The trail now is along the right bank of the river going upstream. Look behind to see snow clad peaks from Sonamarg valley..

Aug 13 & Aug 31 (Day 3): Nichnai (11,500ft) to Vishansar lake (12,000ft) via Nichnai Pass (13500ft) 12km Trek (6/7 hrs)
The walk is surrounded by meadows and towering snow peaks. After 2hrs of steep ascend from Nachnai campsite you will be reaching Nachnai Pass (13500ft), and from here you will be getting down towards Vishansar Lake. The best of all is the different shades of colour in the water across the lakes. Throughout your journey, green mountains, deep blue sky and innumerable glaciers will accompany you. The campsite here is so beautiful with open ground, we can play some games here if time permits. The lake starts getting its colours when the sun shines. On a clear sunny morning, the water is absolutely blue.

Aug 14 & Sept 01 (Day 4): Rest day at Vishansar. (Depending on conditions)
This day we have kept specially for rest and acclimatization, Morning we will do some physical exercise and yoga. Also, we may go to visit Kishansar lake which is just 1km away from our campsite. If weather conditions are not good then we may move to our next camp. A rest day can be used at Gangabal campsite..

Aug 15 & Sept 02 (Day 5): Vishansar (12,000ft) to Gadsar (13,750ft) via Kishansar lake and Gadsar Pass (13,750ft) 14km Trek (9/10hrs)
Today we start early as we will be reaching the highest point of the trek. This day's climb is a crucial one. The trail now begins towards the Gadsar pass along with a large view of Vishansar and Kishansar lake behind. It takes around 2/3hr to reach to the top of Gadsar pass. Once you reach Gadsar pass then you will realize that all the pain was worth taking to be where you are! What a beautiful serene view standing at the top of the Gadsar pass looking down. One is definitely prettier than the other, and not a place for a long visit, you can enjoy the view of Vishansar and Kishansar lake with clear sky and clouds.
If you choose not to camp next to Gadsar, the next place to camp would be the Gadsar army camp. To move beyond the army camp, one needs permission from their Headquarters. The Headquarters is 3 miles further away down into the tree line near a village.

Aug 16 & Sept 03 (Day 6): Gadsar (12500ft) to Satsar (12,000ft) 12km Trek (6hrs)
Trek starts after breakfast, initially first one hour we will be descending, after that a steeper ascend will come which will take 3 hrs, after that, a gradual walk along the meadows, till Satsar camp. We will be crossing several streams on the way. People called it Satsar because it is actually a collection of 7 lakes. Another beautiful, peaceful lake in this amazing trek. Beyond the ridge there will be one more Army Check post, please keep your ID Cards ready for checking. After checking we will go little further to army check post to set up our camp.

Aug 17 & Sept 04 (Day 7) : Satsar to Gangabal twin lakes (11,500ft), 11km Trek (6hrs)
The day will start with gradual ascends and descends. Final steep ascend will take 2 hrs to reach Jazz pass. Once you reach Jazz pass you will forget all your pain because of the cool weather, clear skies, fantastic views, you can enjoy twin lakes while admiring the scenery. There are two icy water lakes beside each other, and the view is spectacular. This place is definitely worth taking a panoramic shot of, on clear days, you will get a clear view of both the lakes Gangbal and Nandkol. Even when it's not sunny, the mist will add a bit to the mysterious and magical feeling of the place.
After the amazing view of two lakes, we will start the descend towards Gangal lake. Gangabal lake is the largest lake in this trek. Gangabal lake is just 15 mins distance from Nandkol lake. Today we will be camping near Nandkol Lake. There are several awesome viewpoints overlooking the lakes.

Aug 18 & Sept 05 (Day 08): Gangabal (11500) to Naranag (7,400ft) and Drive to Srinagar
Early in the morning, the view of the snow-covered Harmukh Peak and the sunrise reflections on the Nandkol lake is mesmerising. After breakfast, we start trekking down towards Naranag village. It will take 5/6 hrs time to reach Naranag. The descent is equally long and tiring through the pine forest. The vehicle will be waiting for us at Naranag village. Start back to Srinagar by private vehicle drive will take 3hrs to reach Srinagar. Stay at hotel in Srinagar (Hotel cost is not included)
--------------------------------------
*Summary*
Event Dates :- 
11 August To 18 August - 2022 (Batch-1)
29 August To 05 September 2022 (Batch-2)
Theme :- Nature's Lover Paradise - Great Lakes of Kashmir Trek
Terrain :- White & Green Mountains 
Duration Of the Event :- 8 days - 7 nights 
Trek Level: - Moderate to Difficult 
Max Altitude: 13750 ft
Trek distance: - 72 KM
Places : Vishansar lake , Krishansar lake ,Gadsar Lake , Harmukh peak , Gangabal Twin Lakes.
Team Size :- 10/20
Reporting location : Shrinagar 
Reporting Time : 07:30 AM 
Reporting Dates : 11 August 2022 & 29 August 2022
Food : Veg
Accomodation :- Shared Rooms & Shared Tents
Trek Fee : INR 14000/Person
==========
Please click on the link for Things to Carry : - http://bit.ly/ThingsToCarry

Payment Details
=====================
Confirm with Advance Amount Rs 5000 or full amount and the remaining amount will be collected on 1 week before the trek.

Google Pay : 9686633699
Phone pay/PayTm : 9686633699
UPI : madadventurerblr@okhdfcbank
Or

-----------------------------------------------

* RTPCR Negative Report or RAT Negative report is mandatory (less than 72 hours)
* Adventurous trek/trip does NOT come with luxury, so please have the mindset accordingly
* Smoking & Drinking strictly prohibited during the event
* Itinerary can be changed, in case of snow, rainfall and landslides.
* Strictly follow the Reporting time, Program schedule and Instructions given by the Organizers through the entire duration of the program.
* In our Package Transportation included from & Srinagar.
* on 10 & 28 August stay - Dinner and enroute to base camp the breakfast and lunch are not included in the package 
* last day enroute lunch are not included
* Event Schedule, route and weather conditions are not predictable so subject to change in case of any inconvenience that occurred at the time of tour without any prior intimation. Travelers have to adjust to any such consequence.
* Mad Adventurers reserves all rights to modify or cancel the trekking event due to unavoidable circumstances.
* Everyone should inform your family members / Care takers about your Trekking plan along with our Company contact details.

*Package Cost Includes*
================
* Transportation from Srinagar to Srinagar 
* Trekking, Camping, sightseeing etc
* Hotel & tent Accommodation (3 or 2 Sharing basis)
* All meals while on trek (Veg)
* Permits (Foreign national need to pay extra on spot)
* Basic First aid medical kits
* All Entry gates fees
* Qualified and Experienced Trek Leader, support staff, Helpers Local route guide

*Package cost Excludes*
===============
• Airfare Bangalore to Shrinagar & Shrinagar to Bangalore + Airport to Srinagar city car fare.
• August 10th & 28 Night stay at Shrinagar & Dinner
• Mineral Water or Soft Drinks
* Mules or porter to carry personal luggage while trekking.
* Cost Escalation due to natural reason.
* Unscheduled stay due to a landslide.
* Insurance
• On first day en route to base camp the breakfast is not included
• last day en route lunch not included
